There isn't much in the neighborhood business wise, or at least what I saw when I went for a walk.  Local Coffee Shop was…

title: Great Hotel
review: My husband and I stayed here night before leaving from Dublin airport next morning as it was our 20th anniversary we thought it might be nice to be closer to the airport as we're from Mayo. I knew the hotel was around 15km from airport but didn't want the usual airport hotel so it was nice to be by the seaside in Balbriggan.  I had made a request for an updated room if possible as it was our anniversary and we were so surprised and delighted to find that we were updated to the suite. The room was beautiful, the staff were friendly advising us about airport parking and overall a great modern hotel, lovely bar with good food. Definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who's willing to drive to the airport next day.

title: Peaceful place to unwind after flying to Dublin
review: Dear annadesign101,  I would like to start by thanking you for your review of the hotel after your recent stay with us for the very happy occasion of your 20th anniversary, quite the milestone!! Thank you for pointing out that we are a seaside town and still close enough to the airport that it is a comfortable and short journey. I was delighted to hear that the team upgraded your room for your anniversary, we will always try to fulfill people's requests whenever we can. Your recommendation is appreciated and we hope to see you again here at the hotel in the near future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Nice visit
review: We arrived in Dublin and after getting our rental car made our way about 25 minutes north to Balbriggan... my GPS was a little confused but I found the hotel right on the main street.  (note - there is an underground garage entrance just to the right of the main doors... just park anywhere and go up to the lobby)  It's an old building, but the room was large (very large by European standards) and the bed was great!  Most of all, the staff were great!  The breakfast was worth the extra money when booking... there is really nothing else around the area (restaurants, etc.,) so the restaurant inside the hotel is THE place to eat.  It's outside of Dublin, but not far.   We'd stay there again if coming to Dublin.

title: Just about ok, but wouldn't be in a rush back to stay
review: Dear SMT56,  Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent stay with us. The GPS has a habit of being confused I think!!! But delighted that you found us safe and sound and had such a great stay. Our car park is a big advantage all right and being so close to the hotel proves very convenient. Once again I am receiving more compliments regarding the team here at the hotel, they certainly do offer a big welcome. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed our food also and most importantly that you would return to our hotel if visiting again, we look forward to welcoming you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Great Stay
review: The front desk staff at this place is awesome. There was a girl named Kathy that got our rooms ready by 11am because she knew how tired from travel we where. They took care of arranging all the taxis for us. The bar was great and dinner was too. They have a hardy breakfast. The rooms are typical European but the shower had great water pressure and warm. The rooms where very clean. Great stay.

title: Ok bar food
review: We used to love eating here but the last few times the food just hasn't been great. We have been disappointed a few times over the last year or so which was never the case before. We still go for a few drinks as love the bar area - as long as there's not a wedding on, then it can become overcrowded.

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Dear mk1901,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel, it really is very much appreciated. However I was so disappointed reading through your review that your experience has been disappointing the last few times you have visited. I really would like the opportunity to discuss this with you on a one one to one basis as regular feedback is vital so that we can constantly monitor and review and standards and procedures. Please do contact me directly at georgina@brackencourt.ie.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Out of date and out of the way
review: We decided to stay here before a flight out of Dublin airport. This is a beautiful little town and the hotel is very nice. Our room was 319 and it was a nice size corner room and very clean, no view however as you were looking onto apartments.   Went to the lobby bar which was very nice and had some drinks,  there was a wedding going on so it was quite lively.  It was a little noisy around 2 AM as there was a wedding in the hotel and then again around 4:30 AM as there was someone in the back alley.  All the staff were excellent, helpful and very friendly.

title: Unexpected and fabulous upgrade!!
review: Dear Elaine C,  Thank you very much for your review of the hotel after you decided to stay with us for one night before your departure. Room 319 is certainly a nice spacious room with all the necessary amenities so delighted to hear that you enjoyed your accommodation. The hotel can become quite lively at night wen there is events on but you seemed to have enjoyed the atmosphere! I will pass on your very kind comments to all the staff, they certainly are a huge accolade to the hotel. I do hope that you will visit again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Balbriggan Hotel
review: Out of date hotel stuck in 1980s my wife and I stayed here  last week for one night only and will never be back .first its miles for nowhere in a run down part of Dublin  .no restaurants in the area  the hotel restaurant and bar  menu is a joke as breakfast was. I was  a head chef  and executive chef for 15 years and have never seen anything like it .as for lobby    don't sit no chairs or coaches as most broken. Staff unfriendly  and unhelpful . rooms again dated but clean .TV had to be turned on and off by switch on wall  as  remote control was not working. one small lift which took forever of go up or down faster by stairs  everything thing could be so much better in every way .......

title: Visit for grandson's first communion!
review: Unable to book into our usual accommodation in Skerries, we managed to get a room for 3 nights at the Bracken Court in Balbriggan.  Having flown into Dublin airport we took the airport link bus into the city and the train to Balbriggan, the hotel being a short walk from the railway station.  Sadly, the Main Street has seen better days with many shops empty and a number of properties in need of som tlc.  The hotel is an impressive building, if giving the appearance of being a little old fashioned from the outside.  The interior is much different, although some of the sofas have seen better days.  Reception was very efficient and the bar area is obviously popular with locals and visitors.  Our room was pleasant with plenty of storage, although the bed proved to be a little too…

title: A friendly place to stay
review: Dear rjones50,  Thank you so very much for your recent review of the hotel after your stay with us for three nights. The unfortunate situation that lead you to our door has worked to our advantage as from your review, you will certainly return! I will certainly look into the issues that you have raised so that we can improve on such things. Thank you for the detail of your review and I am just delighted that the stay was so satisfactory for you. I will pass on all your kind words to the team who will appreciate all aspects and we hope to see you again soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Lovely hotel
review: We stayed here for three nights, arriving by train. The hotel was a 5 minute stroll away. Reception staff greeted us warmly and check in was quick. Our room on the third floor was large and airy. Double bed, small table and two chairs and plenty of wardrobe and drawer space. The ensuite bathroom was roomy and clean. The shower proved to be very efficient. Nice soap, bath gel and shampoo were provided. There was a hair drier in the bathroom and also one in a drawer in the bedroom. We ate in the bar on two evenings. The food and Guinness were both good and the staff were very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was taken in the dining room on a self service basis. There was a variety of cereals, fruit, yogurt, breads and pastries. Cooked food was prepared and serve at the pass. There…

title: Lovey hotel
review: Dear Grannydragon,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your three night stay with us. Your review is very detailed and informative and I am so happy that your stay was so satisfactory. The accommodation was to your liking with the small issues to be addressed, I will certainly look into these for you. Overall, you seemed to enjoy our hospitality and facilities so I do hope that you will return and we look forward to welcoming you once again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Lovely. Amazing food great service
review: Hotel is in the centre of Balbriggan.    We got a fantastic deal that included an evening meal.  Our room was beautiful.   There was on site parking available.   Good location if you prefer not to stay in Dublin city centre but still close enough to travel in.   Dinner and breakfast were both great.   Staff were very friendly.

title: Brissy Traveller.
review: We choose to stay at this hotel as we were flying out of Dublin the next morning. It is on the north side of the airport and an easy drive there to drop of a rental car. A quaint little town with a very lively hotel/pub even though it was Easter Monday night. We had a huge room with a nice bathroom. There was free uncover parking right beside the hotel too.

title: Very happy with every service in this hotel
review: Dear Grant M,  Many thanks for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent stay with us. We are certainly a very convenient hotel  if you are travelling to or form the airport and the drive is a short and pleasant one so I am glad that you found this location worked well for you. Our rooms are also very diverse in size and style so delighted that you enjoyed your allocated bedroom for the night. I do hope that you will visit us again when you are on your travels and we look forward to welcoming you once more.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: dublin weekenders
review: Great hotel,very friendly staff. Had my sons communion meal for all my family,everyone was very pleased. They even had a little kiddies corner,which the kids loved! We go for Sunday carvery and food and service is great.

title: Very Disappointing
review: Dear Denise M,  Thank you so very much for taking the time to post a review after the very happy occasion of your son's communion, it is very much appreciated. I am delighted that the day was such a success for you and I will pass on your very kind comments to all of the team. It is great to see that you are a regular customer to our Sunday carvery also, thank you for your continued loyalty.   Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Disgraceful customer service
review: amazing hotel. had a great stay. cant fault it. staff were super friendly and couldnt do enough to help. the breakfast was good value and tasty. we will be returning again as soon as my wallet recovers from the temple bar assult.

title: Lovely friendly hotel
review: Even though we arrived after 9pm we were still able to get a much needed meal at the bar.  All staff were friendly and welcoming and the rooms were very clean, warm and beds very comfortable.  Free parking was a bonus as was the wi-fi.

title: Great Value
review: Dear Rachel D,  Thank you very much for your recent review of the hotel. It seems that every aspect of your stay was enjoyable and that we have provided all the necessities for your convenience, delighted to hear this. Everything you would want for an overnight stay, substantial meal, warmth, friendly staff and a comfortable bed and of course the obligatory WIFI and bonus free parking. Thanks again for your review and hope to see you again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Lovely base of operations
review: 4 friends on a short golfing break stayed in this central hotel. The hotel was fully booked but the staff appeared to have time for everyone. Balbriggan is a soulless town but very convenient to many golf courses.  Rooms were well finished with good amenities including wifi. Both evening meal and breakfast were of good quality.  This is my second visit and I would definitely return.

title: fantastic customer service
review: Dear John M,  Many thanks for your recent review of the hotel, it is very much appreciated. I am delighted that our team here at the hotel impressed by their time and attention to all our guests, we are very proud of them. North County Dublin boasts many beautiful golf courses and we are indeed very convenient to almost all of them so thank you for your recommendations. I am especially delighted to read that this is your second time here and that you intend to return again. We very much look forward to welcoming you and your party.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Quiet stay
review: Just returned from a week in Ireland with this hotel as our base of operations. The hotel is about 35 minutes from Dublin and easily accessed off the M1. The staff were all very helpful and friendly. The pub in the hotel provided a nice pint and a great place to finish up a day of touring around the island. Our room was well appointed and very comfortable. A huge plus was the on site free parking which can often be a challenge. I would certainly recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a place to stay while exploring the east coast.

title: Very enjoyable
review: Although a little further from Dublin than we had imagined we were actually pleased to be there. We were ther for rugby at Lansdown Road and took the train it was clean and only cost 10 euros each return. Staff very friendly, especially the jolly singing chef at breakfast, which was hot and filling. The whole hotel was extremely clean our room was quiet and comfortable.  Ate in the restaurant on Saturday night and had a good meal.

title: Mini break
review: Dear 283tim,  Many thanks for your recent review of the hotel. We are outside of the Dublin City limits all right but as you have experienced, North County Dublin is easily accessible and very well serviced by an excellent train service to the big city while you can also have a relaxing getaway, the best of both worlds! The breakfast chef will be very happy with his new title, I am delighted that he, and indeed all the staff were so welcoming during your stay. Glad you enjoyed the food at breakfast and dinner so hopefully we will see you again soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: An enjoyable break
review: Stayed in the Bracken court for three days , we found the hotel and staff very helpful and welcoming . We were up graded to a fabulous executive suite with a four poster bed. Breakfast and food in hotel wa s execellent and staff were so helpful especially Emma & Aoife on reception.  Highly recommend this hotel

title: Good location, nice hotel
review: Dear Jean202015,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent stay with us, it is very much appreciated. Your recommendation is gratefully received and I am delighted that every aspect of your stay was so satisfactory. I will pass on your very kind comments to the team and especially the girls, they will be very happy. I am glad that enjoyed the upgrade, when we are full, sometimes you van be lucky!! We do hope to see you again soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Great atmosphere, better staff!
review: Just returned from a long weekend at the Bracken Court Hotel.The rooms were excellent and the staff were amazing,so friendly and they would go the extra mile to make your stay perfect.We ate in the hotel on our first night and there again great food and service.We would certainly return here again

title: No Children
review: We stayed at the Bracken Court for a three night family break over St Patricks weekend, went into Dublin City centre for the parade with the kids and back to the hotel for the evening and dinner, unfortunately we were not allowed into the bar for food - food not being served platters only!! - the picture says it all!!! NO CHILDREN  Complained to reception that we were on a 3 night break and couldn't eat in the hotel she wasn't interested and just referred me to supervisor/manager and then he wasn't interested either.  We ate the next night in the hotel bar and really shouldn't have - poor menu, staff disinterested.  Went for breakfast the next morning and kids spied iced donuts and raced to the counter to be told they were not included for breakfast!!! No cash with us at…

title: Lovely lunch and catch up.
review: Dear HoD123,  Thank you so much for your recent review of the hotel, it is very much appreciated. I am so sorry that all aspects of your stay were so unsatisfactory as we are a very family orientated hotel and endeavor to make our all guests welcome and comfortable. On the particular day you have mentioned, we had a rule in the main bar for Health & Safety reasons and had other options for families and children, I can only apologise that you were not made aware of these options. I really would like the opportunity to discuss these issues with you further as there is alot to explain, especially our very strong WIFI throughout the hotel? My direct email is Georgina@brackencourt.ie if you would like to contact me directly.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Outstanding service and experience!!!
review: Really enjoyed lunch here. Arrived around 2.45 carvery finished at 3.00. We opted for the salad bar. Fantastic choice. We had a mixture of potato with pesto and basil, olives, coleslaw, chick peas noodles and carved ham. The two salads cost a very reasonable just over 11 euro. There was a lovely selection of desserts which we declined (too full) We moved to the bar for a glass of vino. The staff were all lovely we will be back.

title: Clean hotel nice staff good value good location.
review: Dear Anne C,  Many thanks for taking the time to post a review of our carvery lunch after your visit, it is very much appreciated. Our carvery is very popular so I am delighted to hear that as a first time customer you enjoyed the variety and the service. Most importantly, it is fantastic that you will certainly return, we look forward to welcoming you again. Thank you for pointing out that the food is very reasonably priced and that the hotel is a great place for a catch up with friends as well as serving the local community for lunch!  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Good experience
review: My family had booked 3 rooms on a deal for a stay in December 2016. We arrived at the hotel which was lovely and the rooms were spacious and clean. We had initially bought a two night deal with dinner and breakfast included. Unfortunately my 2year old daughter became very unwell as she suffers a heart condition...and was rushed to hospital early the next morning. We hadn't been in the hotel 24hrs and everything was very hectic! A while later I contacted the hotel about our situation and they were so accommodating to us. We received another night complimentary including dinner and breakfast and the staff were so welcoming and very good with the children. The food was stunning and there were lots to do nearby including enjoying afternoon tea at the castle. We really appreciate how…

title: weeekend
review: this is a beautiful hotel the staff is so friendly and the food is 1st class the staff can not do enough for you which is hard to find these days plus ur car is park underground in a safe place  recommend this hotel very highly

title: Overnight stay.
review: Stayed here for one night on a recent trip. Staff were excellent. Receptionist Emma was very helpful when booking. A minor initial mix-up when checking in was quickly rectified. Room was extremely comfortable if perhaps a little dated. A good sized bathroom with separate shower. Plenty of hot water in the morning. Breakfast was plentiful and good selection too. Have stayed here before and will be back again no doubt.

title: Great Stay
review: Just back from one of the best value Hotel Deals we have had in a long time. We stayed for two nights BnB + an evening meal also tickets into Funtasia Water Park. Lovely friendly staff great family room very clean evening meal was superb everything was cooked to perfection and nicely presented. Will def be returning couldn't recommend it enough.

title: Great hotel
review: Dear ian r,  Thank you so much for your recent review of the hotel after your stay on one of our many family deals that include activities. I am delighted to hear that you had such an enjoyable time here and that everything was to your satisfaction. Our family rooms are certainly spacious and ideal for a longer stay also. Our staff are a credit to us and we are indeed very proud of them and chef will be over the moon with your very kind comments. I am especially happy to hear that you will definitely be returning and we look forward to welcoming you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Disappointed
review: Me and wife stay here all the time love this hotel can't wait in march to stay again food is 5 stars breakfast as well fews or great parking is really handy lovely walks also children friendly hotel..

title: Fabulous!!!
review: From the minute we arrived everything was superb. Reception staff so welcoming and helpful even lending me an umbrella;  printing train timetable and giving directions. We had a 3 course meal on our  first night with the package. Food and staff were lovely. The restaurant was very spacious and modern. My husband loved the breakfast; the chef was very friendly nothing was to much trouble. The rooms were warm very tastefully decorated and very comfortable. This hotel is very worthy of it's 4 stars. We also enjoyed the music in the bar on one of our nights. Would highly recommend this hotel and look forward to returning in the near future. Thank you to all the staff for a fabulous weekend. 😊

title: Had many lunches here
review: Dear Iq123,  Many thanks for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your two night stay with us, it really is very much appreciated. It is so great to read through your review and see that you were extremely happy with every aspect of your stay. Our team here at the hotel are our biggest accolade and we are very proud of them. I will certainly pass on all your kind comments to one and all and I can assure you they will be delighted. Thank you for pointing out that our four stars are earned as we certainly monitor our facilities and standards regularly to ensure that this is the case. I look forward to seeing you again in the near future and thank you again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Valentines break
review: Have had lunch here many times as it is close to my office. Is is a carvery setup . The choice is really extensive while the quality is rather good. Price is reasonable and parking is free.i usually have a meat dish and can vouch for the ham and beef. Veg is hit and miss but not bad. Staff are friendly and efficient.  Price is reasonable.

title: A great welcome
review: Dear larryrdoyle,  Thank you so much for your recent review of our carvery here at the hotel. I am delighted to hear that you do visit us often as your office is quite close by. We do appreciate local business support so thank you again. We have extended our offering in our carvery over the past year or so and it has proved very popular, suitable for most, from a light bite to our full size main courses so it is great to hear that you can vouch for our locally sourced meat dishes. Our free car parking is indeed an advantage and our team is the finest. I do hope to see you frequent the hotel in the future and we look forward to welcoming you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Clean, friendly ... just ask for a quiet room!
review: We got married in this hotel in august and have stayed in this hotel a few times and everytime the staff outdo themselves and are a credit to the hotel. The reception staff always make up feel at home. The room we stayed in this time was 501 and it was exceptional. Our favourite room is 312 it's a spacious 4 poster bed. Also the bar downstairs is lively and drinks are reasonably priced for a hotel bar.

title: coming home
review: came to ireland first time since was born arrived at hotel Bracken Court only hotel in Balbriggan given warm welcome by staff room basic for 4 star hotel not very good sleep due to sea gulls at 4.30 in the morning hotel breakfas twas lovely even though was buffet style lady chef warmed breakfast under grill very nice bar staff friendly nice atmosphere in hotel though enjoyed my stay coming back in april so hopefully better

title: Disappointing
review: Dear Georgebest2014,  Many thanks for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent visit. I am delighted that you received such a warm welcome by our team and the atmosphere was so nice and friendly. We are right beside the sea here at the hotel so whilst this is obviously an advantage for sightseeing and coastal retreats, we do unfortunately have the seagulls that go with this location so I do apologise if there was some disturbance. We look forward to seeing you again here at the hotel.  Kinf Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Lovely place
review: Stayed at the hotel with my husband upon arrival we were given a room with no hot water.  We were quickly moved to another room in the older part of the hotel, advised that there was a function that evening.  So we decided to stay in our original room which we figured would be quieter.  Furniture in room seemed a bit dated and the mattress was uncomfortable.  Had dinner at the restaurant which had lovely decor made the mistake of ordering the chicken liver pate and was violently ill for most of the night!!  The receptionist didn't seem too bothered and said she will let the kitchen know.

title: Lovely weekend away
review: Dear Paula M,  Thank you for your review of the hotel after your recent visit. I was however, very disappointed to hear that some elements of your stay were not satisfactory and you were disappointed with the overall experience. We did indeed have an issue with the hot water for a very short time this weekend which was rectified by our engineer very quickly, unfortunately this can sometimes happen and is out of our control but I do apologise for the inconvenience. Regarding your choice of menu and your subsequent illness, I would like to speak directly on this and would hope that you will give me this opportunity. You can contact me directly at georgina@brackencourt.ie. I look forward to hearing from you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Overrated and expensive
review: We stayed here for a three night break..was perfect location for our needs. Close to the see train and bus services.  The food was excellent and live entertainment Friday and Saturday.. excellent breakfast.  Large spacious room.. helpful and courteous staff.

title: Nice rooms. Friendly staff
review: Only stayed one night but had a very positive experience.  I ordered a meal in advance of my late arrival and it all worked seamlessly.  Emma at the desk was super friendly.  Large bedrooms, sensible rates. What's not to like? Quick tip - my TV was a bit long in the tooth and there weren't many channels. Probably needs updating. I'll definitely use this hotel again though.  Nice people 😀

title: Party on
review: Dear Rob S,  Thank you do much for your recent review of the hotel after your short stay with us. Well it certainly is a glowing reference and great to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you will be back again. I will pass on your very kind comments to Emma and all the team. I will certainly report your issues with the television but I am delighted that your overall stay was a success. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Nice Stay
review: From the very first phone call to book the room to checking out we were made feel like a million dollars, nothing was too much. Our family room was beautiful, large and spacious, plenty of room for 3 of us,  the food was delicious and there was more than enough to go around. The staff couldn't do anymore for us,

title: Fantastic Hotel - Great near airport hotel
review: Dear LollyTike,  Thank you so much for your recent review of the hotel. It was an absolute pleasure to read that you were so impressed with every aspect of the hotel and our services. Our family rooms are indeed very spacious and comfortable so glad you found them to your liking. Our team here at the hotel are outstanding and go out of their way to make everything perfect for our guests so it is great to hear that they looked after you so well. I hope that you will be returning to the hotel for any further occasions and we look forward to seeing you again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Great night away
review: Stayed here on New Years eve, we live locally but chose to stay as we knew the party would be going on till the early hours of the morning and didnt want the hastle of looking for a taxi. The party we were at was lovely and the food very tasty. The room we had was lovely, the bathroom was a wet room which suited us fine. One small gripe was the lift, obviously the hotel was full and with only one lift to serve a large hotel, queues were inevitable. All in all a nice hotel to stay in

title: Great hotel
review: Just back from a lovely stay here. We arrived early and it was no bother to leave bags as we were heading to Dublin for the day. The receptionist offered to look up train times for us. The train station is just a 5 min walk with trains every half hour or so to Dublin. On our return we checked in and our room on the 3rd floor was brilliant. Big windows, bright, clean and tastefully decorated. Only had shower in the room but was no inconvience to us. We had a meal in the bar and the food was good, and have to say the bar staff, particularly Thomas, were efficient and friendly and had no time waiting on food or drinks. Very comfortable night's sleep. Breakfast was Ok, but as we waitied to nearly the end of service to go down can't complain. All in all a brilliant hotel and would…

title: Christmas Day  Respite
review: Dear Kellymoy,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent visit. I am delighted to hear that you had such an enjoyable stay. We are certainly very central when you want to take that trip to Dublin, very convenient and regular service. The rooms on the third floor are indeed very large and spacious as most of our rooms are and if you would prefer to have a bath in the future, please do call and we can arrange this for you. I will pass on your kind comments to chef and of course Thomas who will appreciate this very much. We look for ward to welcoming you again in the near future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Lucch very disappointying
review: We stayed at the Bracken Court for Christmas Day  , and  overnight  to Stephens Day Breakfast. The room was comfortable and spacious , and the hotel did not stint on the heating. In fact it was too warm, which is a good sign and continued for the duration of the visit, as the hotels hospitality extended to everything. Starting with a Mulled Wine and Prosecco reception in the Bar. Buffet lunch followed. I was suprised at the variety and layout of the Buffet. The starters were delicious and catered for all tastes. Sushi, Salads, Cold Meats and Salmon. If you didnt like the Main course then the Starters would be a perfect choice, for the fussiest of eaters. Main course was the standard Turkey and Ham and Sirloin Beef, and Cod Mornay. Hot and plentiful, with all the trimmings. .…

title: Brilliant stay @ The Bracken Court Hotel
review: Dear Claire G,  Many thanks for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent visit on Christmas Day, it is very much appreciated. We are just delighted that you had such an enjoyable stay and of course lunch. I shall pass on all your lovely comments to the chef and the rest of the team here at the hotel, they will welcome the praise indeed. I am also glad that you found the hotel so warm and welcoming and that our hospitality was evident in every way. We hope to see you again soon and of course, hopefully for next year's celebrations!  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Good value for money
review: Went there 27th December 2016 for lunch with friends, it was a carvery, We decided to have a 3 course. The  meat was good , not fantastic , vegetables were  best described as crap,very much overcooked, Place was quite , probably the day that was in it.  The staff were very helpful and the service for the desserts and Tea was excellent , overall I would probably give a miss in future.

title: Amazing!
review: This was a great stay starting with secure underground parking and a warm welcome from the reception staff.  Our room was a suite on 3rd floor, spotless, warm and comfortable.  Dinner in the restaurant was good quality and warm. We had room service breakfast and it was great quality piping hot and loads of it. We were on a wowcher deal and this place far exceeded my expectations!

title: Not a 4* hotel
review: Dear Sharon I,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent stay with us, it is very much appreciated. I am delighted to hear that you had such a successful stay and that we exceeded your expectations, excellent to see. The hotel has indeed many advantages that include our car parking and of course our very friendly team so I do hope that you will return to us again in the future. I will also pass on your very kind feedback to the chef and his team. Have a wonderful Christmas.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: quite good
review: Stayed in the Bracken Court Hotel I don't know how it a 4* it's the most basic town centre hotel. The bedrooms are very tired & old, (i dont mean antique) they badly need to be updated.  The bed my daughter slept in was a fold up bed with wooden bars so she pulled the thin matress onto the floor to sleep. Those temporary beds should be of much better quality for a 4* or any hotel,  They are atrocious & unacceptable in my opinion.  You could hear the car alarms going off in the downstairs car park all night. Then the bins came v early.  The shower is stuck to the wall (not hand held) they did not provide shower hats conditioner or shampoo so I had to wrap a towel on my hair while showering  to keep it dry.  The Breakfast fruit bowel consists of chopped up apples... & very little…

title: Very Good Value One Night Stay
review: Dear Claire F,  Many thanks for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent stay with us. It is only through these channels that we can constantly monitor and if necessary change some of our standards and procedures. I am so sorry to hear that most of your stay was unsatisfactory as this is certainly not what how we would want our guests to feel when they depart from the hotel. I can only apologise for the condition of your camp bed and I will have maintenance check all camp beds for the future so thank you for bringing this to our attention. Again, I am sorry that our breakfast was not to your satisfaction and I can assure you that all your comments will be taken on board and acted upon. Thanks you again for all your feedback, it is very much appreciated.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: hospitality at its best
review: the hotel is quite good, clean, quiet, central, spacious rooms, friendly staff, breakfast is not super but u have an option but does not meet 4 star standards: no slippers, no body cream, no conditioner etc. Make sure u carry all this with u ...A bit pricy for what it offers!

title: Outstanding in every way
review: The Bracken Court Hotel was, without exception, the best stay of our three-week trip and not just because of the room. From the warm greeting by the hotel staff when we arrived, to the delicious three-course dinner, excellent breakfasts, friendly bar, and unfailingly cheerful helpfulness of everyone, we could not have asked for a better end to our travels.   We were two couples staying for three nights in very comfortable and quiet rooms. The train and bus were mere blocks away as were many of the stores we needed. We went into Dublin every day and had no trouble making connections to other parts of the coast.  The Bracken is an older hotel and perhaps the rooms could benefit from a new coat of paint. But, honestly, in terms of comfort and cleanliness, I wouldn't change a thing.…

title: Real value for money & a great place to stay
review: Dear JustATravelerWest,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your stay with us, it really is very much appreciated. Well I am just so delighted that every part of your stay was so very enjoyable and of course the team here at the hotel making you feel so welcome. I will certainly pass on your kind comments to Ramona in the restaurant and also to the rest of the staff and I am sure they will greatly appreciate the praise. We are indeed very central and accessible to Dublin and have our own lovely town that offers its own uniqueness. The chef will be over the moon with your fine descriptions of his fabulous food, I will make sure he gets the review. Well I certainly hope if you are ever returning to Ireland on an extended trip again, you will come and visit us and we look forward to welcoming you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: The definition of hospitality
review: Hotel is centrally located, free parking in adjacent car park, no direct connection to the hotel. Staff is friendly, helpful & service excellent. The phone & one of the bedside lamps didn't work in the first room, so we moved to another. Everything was clean, the beds comfortable & the breakfast great. Only 15 minutes from Dublin Airport & we got a fabulous rate, definitely good value for money. Will definitely stay there again.

title: Excellent service
review: Dear KPDH,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent stay with us. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay so much and just delighted that you will definitely be returning. We are very central to everything and the free car parking certainly is a bonus. Our team here at the hotel seem to have enhanced your stay with their friendliness and excellent service so this is great to hear and also that your bedroom was eventually to your satisfaction. I am sorry about the earlier inconveniences but delighted that you were moved to a more satisfactory room. We look forward to welcoming you again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: good for functions
review: The Bracken Court Hotel must be a great place to work because all staff members we encountered were warm, friendly, personable and above all - hospitable.  We booked a last-minute room here - from the 20th to the 21st - to get away from a poor experience at a different hotel. We chose it based on high-ratings and proximity to the train station (we had a car, but driving a car in Dublin is silly).  We arrived shortly after noon and decided to try to check-in early so we parked in the attached garage and brought in our luggage.  It turns out that the previous night was busy so rooms were not yet ready but the staff offered to hold onto our bags while we visited Dublin.  And what a staff! There were two young ladies working the front desk that afternoon and they were not only…

title: Not worth it!
review: This hotel is trying to be fancy and modern, but it sucks!  My husband tried to shower before bed and our shower was scalding hot and couldn't be made colder.  He figured he would just take a bath (separate tub from shower), but thee was no stopper for the bath.  He went to call the front desk with the hotel phone and there were no numbers or writing on the phone and some buttons were even missing.  Finally after waiting an hour and a half and 3 phone calls to the front desk, someone came and realized our shower was broken.  They moved our room (to a suite).  If I would have paid extra for a suite I would have been disappointed.  While the room was much larger, there was still only a small double bed.  It actually looked funny to have a bed that small in such a large room.  Also…

title: A very noisy and sleepless night.
review: Dear Qtpie8422,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent stay with us, it is very much appreciated. I was however extremely disappointed reading through your review as you certainly have not had a satisfactory stay at all. I would really welcome the opportunity to discuss your issues further with you and if you would like to do this, please do not hesitate to contact me directly at: georgina@brackencourt.ie. I do apologise for the issues that you encountered throughout your stay as this is certainly not how we like our guests to leave after their stay. I look forward to hearing form you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Great people, great food, just great!
review: I stayed there on a Saturday night and there was at least one party going on in the hotel if not two.  I regularly stay in hotels and i can honestly say that this was one of the noisiest hotels i have ever stayed at.  I had people knocking on my door in the middle of the night and lots of drunken people wandering around the corridors during much of the night.  My colleague who was in a different part of the hotel to me also experienced the same issues and called down to reception to complain, but that didn't achieve anything.  If you are staying there on a Saturday night, i would recommend checking whether there are going to be any parties on.

title: Great Family Trip!
review: Dear Maureen M,  Thank you for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent visit, it is very much appreciated. I was however very disappointed to read through your feedback as it does not appear that you had a satisfactory stay and were disturbed by party guests and for this I apologise. We are a very popular venue for parties and weddings alike so on most of weekends we are at full capacity. If you would like to contact me directly to discuss the issues you have raised, please do email: georgina@brackencourt.ie and we can discuss further.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Good stay
review: This was a return visit. Have stayed with my partner a few months back and this time brought the family. The reservations team on the phone were exceptional with sorting a spacious room for us and the kids. On check in our two children were all smiles when they found out the two girls on reception were both named Emma. The girls were extremely lovely yet professional. They got our young ones balloons and all which kick started our mini break away. The room was a great size for us and nice and quiet. Thomas in the bar treated us like family! Yet again couldn't fault the food. Lots of choice even for the kiddies. Conor saw us in the restaurant at breakfast and asked how everything was for us and how our stay was going which is always a lovely touch. The feeling of the hotel really…

title: Good value for Money
review: Stayed in Bracken Court again, can never fault staff and restaurant. Rooms good, although do need more attention to housekeeping, found a false nail and peanuts on carpet. We had 2 bad nights sleep though due to the noise. Expected it on first night as have stayed here before and can be noisy when weddings are going on. Second night was worse though, until around 3am. Manager was apologetic next morning and looked after us, so left happier. Strange woman tried to get into our room at 12am also! Good value for money at Hotel

title: Really nice
review: Dera KrisandJon,  Thank you so much for your recent review of the hotel after yet another stay with us. I am delighted to hear that you are a regular guest and that you can not find fault with the team here at the hotel and of course the restaurant. I am, however terribly sorry to hear that both your nights were disturbed by noise but great to hear that you did report it and the manager on duty looked after you and you were staisfied with this. We always like when people comment that we are good value for money as this is something that we constantly strive for here and monitor our prices for these reasons. I will investigate fully the woman at midnight, apologies once again. I look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Family Tayto Park package
review: I really enjoyed my recent stay here at the Bracken Court hotel. The room was lovely and clean and the bed comfortable. Bar food was top notch as was the breakfast the following morning. I will definitely return.

title: Loved it!
review: Dear Deekk,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent stay, it realy is very much appreciated. It is great to hear that ypou enjoyed your stay so much and that everything was to your satisfaction. i will certainly pass on all your complimentary feedback to the chef and his team, they will be delighted. The most pleasing observation from your review is the fact that you will definitely return and we look forwrad to welcoming you once again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Underwhelming
review: Stayed here, family in two rooms. Rooms were clean and newish.a bit rough around the edges. Fridge didn't work in room.was dirty inside. Room was large and clean.the 2nd room was also fine. Problems with the rooms- room located beside ballroom where wedding was being held. Loud music played late.The Other room the window didn't close.alot of street noise and music from downstairs..young kids didn't sleep.poor rooms overall for families.. Dinner was good.staff were nice. Breakfast was good also.  Tayto park was 30mins +/- away. Not a lot to do in Balbriggan. Mostly closed in evening time. Don't think I will be back.

title: Good spot for golf weekend
review: used hotel as base for 3 days golf around the area all booked by hotel, the hotel is around 3 star ish standard with staff very friendly the bar is good at night with music and carpark next door very handy and free, all in a great weekend and the location of hotel spot on.

title: Beautiful 4 Star  Hotel
review: Dear flyer94,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your three day golf retreat! It certainly is a great base when travelling to different golf courses around Dublin and Fingal, there is plenty of choice. Our car park is indeed an advantage when the hotel is so central and on the main street. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed the bar and of course the entertainment. We do hope that you will return in the near future and we look forward to welcoming you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Wedding
review: I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone. The food is amazing and the staff are so friendly they made us feel at home. My Husband and I got married there 2 years ago and it was the most memorable day of our lives with every minor details taken care of by the staff. The function rooms are fantastic for both weddings and parties. The rooms are very well kept and comfortable too. With a lovely breakfast the next morning. It's in a great location near the airport too which is handy if you are planning a nights stay before jetting off somewhere!!!

title: Wedding
review: Dear MrsEFitz,  Many thanks for your recent review of the hotel, it is very much appreciated as it is only through these channels that we can constantly review and maintain our standards. It is great to hear that you are still a loyal customer after hosting your wedding here which was a great day. The staff are indeed our biggest accolade and constantly receive many compliments, I will pass these lovely comments on also, they are always gratefully received. Thank you again for your glowing recommendations and we look forward to welcoming you again very soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Lovely dinner in the restaurant
review: I had my wedding at this hotel on the 26th of August. The staff are very helpful and friendly. They will go the extra mile to help out. I cant thank sinead enough for what she has done for me. Ive never met such a wonderful and helpful person. Without her my wedding wouldnt of have been the same. Conor was also very helpful. The meal was absolutley beautiful the chef is amazing and its nice when the chef comes out to ask how you would rate the food.   The only bad experience i had was prior to the wedding. Their was lack of communication between staff i think. I was given a very small room with a shower the night before my wedding and i slipped in the shower. Thankfully i didnt bang my head. I was annoyed at the fact that my family was given a room with a bath and twice the…

title: Not what I expected !
review: Booked this on Expedia as a hotel near Dublin Airport. Looked good online but one look at it when I arrived at 3pm on a Sunday and I knew I couldn't stay there . It was dirty from you walked in front door, floors not washed , old dingy decor. I checked in but my room wasn't cleaned yet . I had a look around the room and checked out . I usually stay at Clayton, formally Bewleys so I was expecting something similar . Front desk staff were friendly but I would not give this place more than one star based on what I experienced .

title: Wedding
review: Dear Catherine b,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel, albeit that you unfortunately did not stay for the evening but all feedback is greatly appreciated and it is only through these channels that we can monitor and if necessary change our standrads and procedures. I was so sorry to hear that you felt you could not stay here as we do have very many great reviews on the hotel but I am afraid that your disappointing first impressions did not help and for this I am so sorry. I can only think that it was an extremely busy Sunday at our busiest time and you may have been unfortunate enough to experience a passover from shifts but I will certainly take all your feedback on board and investigate fully. Thank you again for the review.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: nice family getaway
review: Hi my son had his wedding here Saturday the 3 September  great day staff was brilliant service was excellent and a big thank you to Connor who I would highly recommend this hotel to any one having a wedding here

title: Real Irish hospitality
review: Dear Montilla4,  Many thanks for your recent review of the hotel after the very happy occasion of your son's wedding. As you will probably know, weddings are a integral part of our business here and we are very proud of our reputation as a venue. We are all delighted that you and your family had such a successful and enjoyable day. I will certainly pass on your lovely comments to Conor and the team who I am sure were only too happy to look after you all on a lovely memorable day. Thank you again for the recommendation and we hope to see you again for more family events.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: No Sleep
review: the staff were lovely to deal with and very helpful. the only thing that went wrong during our stay was that the elevator broke-down and we had to bring bags and 2 kids up to the 3rd floor. apart from that lovely hotel and the restaurant is worth the visit. lovely surf & turf ;)

title: Great stay
review: First time at this hotel and really enjoyed it. All staff where very friendly and good at thier job, room was very big and well kitted out, bathroom was large and well cleaned. The food was possibly the best we have had anywhere in both the restaurant and bar, drink prices where reasonable. Location was good with the local train station only about 5 minutes from hotel which meant we where able to leave car and take train into Dublin city with no worries about parking cars and the price that these can cost in a city. The train return was €10.30 and the trains come very regularly. Free parking at the hotel was another good bonus. Only slight problem was we where 1st floor at front on building and as hotel is on a busy main street there is a lot obf traffic noise in mornings.

title: Very Professional, Friendly and Helpful Staff
review: Dear Uel M,  Many thanks for your recent review of the hotel and I am delighted to hear that you had such a pleasant stay on your first visit with us. It is great to hear that you found our rooms so spacious and clean, they are quite diverse and bigger than normal. The chef and his team will be very excited about your comments on their food and yes, we do try and keep our prices very competitive. The staff are our biggest asset here at the hotel, so great that you noticed this. The train station is certainly very close to the hotel and a lovely trip into town through all the coastal villages and towns. I do hope that we will see you again in the not too distant future. Many thanks again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Brilliant value hotel, perfect for staying the night prior to flying out of Dublin the next day
review: The staff at this hotel are excellent,  Rolanda the young lady in the restaurant is very professional and helpful, Diarmuid goes the extra mile to help you out with a very cheerful attitude and always a smile, and Zeta in Accommodation is also very professional and kind, Thank you all for that. I think the hotel could do with being up dated as it seems to be a shadow of it's former glory. Rooms are spotless and linen is spotless, but walls could be refreshed with a paint  and carpets really need to be replaced. The garden area is very nice but again it needs a good power washing. I didn't eat there so I can't rate the food, but the restaurant was always very busy and people seemed to be happy. A lot of Families stayed there with children, close to attractions for children,…

title: Great banter from staff and very clean
review: Dear 75maria50,  Thank you very much for taking the ime to post a review after your stay with us. Once again, I find myself reiterating how important our staff are to the business and how they are our biggest asset and I can assure you that the above team members that have been mentioned will only be delighted with your comments. I will certainly take all your feedback on board regrading the decor in the hotel and the need for a makeover and pass them onto the relevant departments and management but I am really happy that it did not take away from a wonderful stay. We hope to see you again soon and look forward to welcoming you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Lovely stay
review: We had a fantastic suite with jacuzzi bath and four poster bed. We had a fantastic meal in the restaurant and the breakfast was beautiful - excellent standard of cuisine. This hotel was perfect for us coming from Northern Ireland and saving a long drive the morning of the flight. The staff were excellent and I can't speak more highly of the service provided. We'll be back!

title: Quiet Midweek Break
review: Lovely stay - reasonably priced midweek break. Staff were very friendly and helpful.  We've eaten in the restaurant before, a good variety and reasonably priced. Lacked in atmosphere - but it was a quiet time.   The cocktails in the bar weren't great, we had a mojito without mint leaves, a daiquiri which was more like a slushy.   We chose to have breakfast in the room, a reasonable tray charge and arrived on time and piping hot.   Overall value for money and a good base to visit attractions in Meath/Louth

title: Family wedding
review: Dear Cathy C,  Many thanks for your recent review of the hotel as it is only through these channels that we can constantly monitor and review our standards and operations. It is great to hear that you found all the team to be so friendly and helpful, they are a huge asset to us. Midweek in the restaurant can sometimes be quiet but delighted to see that the menu was plentiful and affordable. I will certainly take your comments on board regarding the cocktails and speak with the bar manager to see where we can improve on this. I am also happy that your room service was on time and piping hot, excatly what we strive for here at the hotel. I do hope that we will see you again and we look forward to welcoming you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Ok Stay
review: Great hotel, lovely staff!! Short walk to the beach, harbor, lovely little town just off the m1. Rooms where lovely and clean! Cant fault the place. Secure car park under the hotel, food was nice, not amazing but nice.

title: Nice hotel
review: Dear Tracey G,  Thank you so much for your review of the hotel after the very happy occasion of a family wedding. As you know, weddings are an integral part of our business here and it is very nice to get great reviews from guests who have attended a wedding at the hotel. The fact that you can not fault us and that you enjoyed the hotel and it's surroundings is fantastic and we do hope that you will visit us again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: All positive
review: While checking-in the receptionist was very blase.  We had to ask what way the lifts were and then later on we had to ask her when the restaurant was and both occasions I felt that she was thinking that I should know where they are.  We booked a double room and what we actually got was just two single beds pushed together which was disappointing.

title: Relaxing
review: The hotel is absolutely beautiful! They have a pub with live music on Fridays and Saturday's. The hotel is centrally located near the train and beach. The distance from the hotel to Temple Bar is around 25 min of breath taking views.

title: Smoking area
review: Dear Linda D,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent visit. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay so much and everything was to your satisfaction. I see you enjoyed our weekend entertainment and explored the surrounded areas which are all within walking distance form the hotel. The views are certainly beautiful on the trip into city centre going through many coastal towns and villages so I am glad that you took full advantage of your time here. I do hope that you will return again soon and we look forwrad to welcoming you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Dont be fooled by the title they give you on Travel booking sites
review: Stayed for four nights recently...Hotel needs some refurbishment stayed in room over smoking area(looked to changed early in the week could not be faciltated)?????? oh good god this is not fair could not open windows of room as a result of smell of smoke and thus heat in room unbearable ...did get fan on last night but then of course had the issue of people/noise in smoking area till all hours ... eat in the restaurant more than adequate breakfast fine .. all in alll good hotel good location for tayto park etc ... however please sort issue with smoking area its just not fair

title: Best Staff Ever!!!
review: Dear Jason H,  Many thanks for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent visit. It is great to see that the location suited all your needs and that you enjoyed the food here at the hotel. I am however very sorry to hear about your experience regarding the smoking area. I will certainly give it my immediate attention and speak with our maintenance department to see if anything can be done to rectify the situation. I do hope that this will not deter you from returning again and we look forward to welcoming you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Beyond excellent!
review: If you booked this as an airport hotel, don't expect a shuttle bus or seeing planes in the air because there will see neither. This airport hotel is 20 miles away and a 40 euro cab ride one way from the airport. It is also 40 miles from Dublin so now you have an 80 euro cab ride if you want to go there. I felt deceived and ripped off and cancelled my stay there. if i  could give this place a zero i would

title: Great stay mid week
review: Stopped over for one night, staff very helpful with bed request for my 2 year old. Food in Restaurant excellent and superb value.  Car parking under hotel very handy. Room rate via booking.com excellent. Hotel very central and plenty of tourist stuff within a few miles.

title: Wedding
review: Dear AdrianGallagher1,  Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your stay with us, these channels are an excellent way for us to monitor and if necessary, review our standards at the hotel. It is great that you enjoyed the stay so much and discovered all that the hotel has to offer and of course the many tourist attractions nearby. I will pass on your kind comments regarding the food and value to the chef and his team and  I am also delighted that the staff were so helpful with your requests. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Regular guests at the Bracken Court Hotel
review: We recently had our wedding in the Bracken Court.  The day went exceptionally well. Many thanks to Conor, Georgia and staff who were very  professional. All aspects was Organised so well and the meal was beautiful.  All who attended had nothing but good words to say about the place.

title: Very good
review: Dear Davy E,  Thanks so much for your review of the hotel after the very happy occasion of your wedding to Lorna!!! I am delighted to hear that all your guests had such a great time and enjoyed the meal so much, the perfect recommendation! We all had a great time looking after you and your guests and as weddings are such an integral part of our business, it is great to hear such rave reviews. Thank you both again for taking the time to post and I will pass on your compliments Conor and the team also. Take care of yourselves and we will see you in the hotel soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Lovely hotel, lovely staff, lovely location
review: This is the ninth time we have spent at the Bracken Court Hotel. We have enjoyed the customer service at the Bracken Court also the brilliant scrumptious food. We have recommended the hotel to numerous friends and relatives over the years  we have been staying here.  Unfortunately this time round we have found that most of the staff both on the front desk & the restaurant have all changed .   The structure of the breakfasts have also changed. As recently as January this year 2016 we would have been meet by a welcoming smile from Ramona the  main restaurant waitress. Tea & coffee plus toast would have been brought to the table while we were free to select our hot food from the breakfast bar. The breakfast chef would have served us. He was friendly and chatty this made us happy to…

title: Just returned from excellent 3 night stay
review: From check in to check out this stay could not be faulted, the standard of room was top class. service was excellent, breakfast was top class . We said we would try the sunday carvery and it was beautiful and very reasonally priced we were so pleased we had our dinner in the hotel on Monday and Tuesday also we normally would only eat in a hotel one out of three days but we were very impressed. great choice of meals. All the staff were very welcoming and helpful.

title: Good location
review: Dear Angela N,  Many thanks for your recent review of the hotel after your three night stay with us, it is very much appreciated. I am delighted to see that you can not fault your stay in any way and that your stay was such a success. Our menus are specially selected for a longer stay so that you have more to choose from and it entices you to come back after you have enjoyed the first experience! I will certainly pass on your comments to the chef and his team and indeed to all the team that made you so welcome. I do hope that you will visit again soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Great place
review: The bracken court is ideally situated for exploring north County Dublin, Dublin City, Meath and Louth. The hotel is close to both the train station which can take you to Drogheda, Skerries, Malahide and Dublin City and a bus route which services Dublin Airport.

title: Quallity and old world charm.
review: Dear CaptainBrooksie,  Thank you so much for your recent review of the hotel after your stay with us. The hotel certainly is in a prime location for touring the local area and all of North County Dublin. I am delighted that you found us so easily accessible for all your travels. Indeed, having the train and bus stations so close to us makes it very easy to travel to many destinations and landmarks. I do hope that you will return to us very soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Lovely hotel with amazing staff.
review: The Bracken Court was amazing they took such great care of me after my flight was cancelled everything was amazing, from the food, to the service, and just great atmosphere I definitely recommend coming here and staying a few days and enjoy yourself

title: Great hotel
review: Beautiful hotel, however when I moved the bed out. It was filthy full of dust, sanitary towels and razors.  I left a complaint card in, never heard anything back....  Very disappointed.but id still stay again.

title: One night stay
review: Dear TonyB1001,  Firstly I would like to thank you for your recent review of the hotel, as it is only through these channels that we can constantly monitor and review our standards. I am however truly disappointed to hear about your experience in your room and even more disappointed that you have not been replied to regarding this issue. I will speak with the accommodation department regarding this and ensure that the issue is rectified and monitored on a regular basis. I can only apologise for this but I am delighted to see that you will be back again. We will look forward to welcoming you. Please do contact me directly for your next stay.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: 2 night family stay
review: We enjoyed our stay. The family room was nice, with two separate rooms.  Breakfast was plentiful, the gentleman cooking the eggs was very pleasant. Nearby beach to stroll. Nearby small shops for provisions.

title: The carvery
review: Dear imirish2016,  Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent visit. It is great to hear that you enjoyed your stay so much. Our family rooms are especially spacious to cater for children. I will pass on your kind comments to the breakfast chef and the team, very much appreciated. I do hope that you will return again and we look forward to welcoming you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Excellent Food Great Staff
review: Beautiful hotel, the rooms were spacious and spotless. The staff were excellent, Thomas in the bar was very pleasant, smiling and helpful, I noticed how patient he was with other staff members ( who seemed to be new). Vanessa was a little gem, very happy, pleasant and had a great knowledge of the food. Big turnover of staff on reception, but couldn't fault them, they were all friendly and helpful. A beautiful hotel close to city centre, the beach and funtasia, will definitely be returning....

title: Clean, warm room and helpful staff!
review: I was very pleasantly surprised with this hotel. The room rate was very reasonable and I thought that perhaps this might mean that the rooms were rundown or grubby. In fact it was quite the opposite.   The room I was given was extremely large. There were two double bedrooms, a large hallway, seating area and bathroom.  Everything was spotlessly clean and it was a very cold night but the room was cosy and snug.   I had a meal in the restaurant downstairs which was delicious and the portion sizes were very generous.   I would definitely stay here again!

title: Expected more got way less
review: Dear Deirdre D,  Thank you so much for your recent review of the hotel after your stay with us. We do try and keep our rates competitive and we definitely do offer value for money as you have experienced . Our rooms are very diverse and can suit any couples or families alike and we do pride ourselves on cleanliness and comfort so i am delighted that you found the room so comfortable. I will pass on your kind comments to the chef and his team on their menu and portion sizes, they will certainly appreciate this. I am especially happy that you would definitely stay with us again and we look forward to welcoming you in the near future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Restaurant Visit
review: All the reviews said this was a great place....I beg to differ.  Room clean, but blanket covering bed has stains on it that I don't want to think about where they came from.  My hubby said turn it over to not look at it.....ugh that was worse.  Even speeding and no traffic, there is no way it is 15 mins from the airport.  Bar was good, helped to drown my sorrows of my night to sleep there, especially with music blaring up through the floor.

title: Good but too expensive!
review: Dear Texasgirl78253,  Many thanks for taking the time to post a review after your recent stay with us, it is very much appreciated. I am so very sorry to hear that you had such a bad experience. I have passed all of your feedback onto the department managers who will fully investigate and work hard to rectify these issues. I am afraid that the hotel can be a little lively on weekends as we are extremely popular for celebrations and weddings alike but I am sure that we would have tried to accommodate you in some way if the noise was brought to our attention. Regarding the airport, we actually have alot of airport stays because of our proximity and we do feel that we are within these limits but again, we take all your comments on board. Thank you again and hopefully you may decide to try the hotel again where we look forward to welcoming you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Nice rooms and a great bar
review: Just back from a really lovely lunch with my family.  Food was beautiful.  There was a carvery on and I most certainly am not a fan of carverys but this one was fantastic.  Plenty of choice even though we were late for lunch.  The staff were so helpful and friendly.  It was also a great price.  It was such a contrast to my last review of The Grand Hotel in Malahide.  The food was tasty, my quiche was served to me, I  didn't have to wait ages for my chips, the salad was beautiful and fresh and all in all the staff went above board to ensure we had a good meal.  I think the management of The Grand should come and see how different the set up is.  Amazing that a 'better hotel' had such bad service and food compared to here.  I will highly recommend here for something to eat.  I…

title: Nice rooms and good food
review: This hotel had very comfortable and spacious rooms and the food was quite good. We had 3 course meal included in our weekend deal and it was really good value for money. 149 euros for both of us for a weekend including the meal.

title: Amazing food, wonderful customer service
review: Dear iansinc61,  Thank you very much for your recent review of the hotel after your stay with us. I am delighted that you found your weekend such good value for money and enjoyed our comfortable bedrooms and fine food in The Bracken Grill. I do hope that you will visit us again very soon and we look forward to welcoming you again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: 30 minutes north of Dublin airport
review: The Bracken Court has free parking for guests and an old-fashioned charm. Moreove,r the food is sensational. My parnter had slamon and I loved their dck with noodles. Both dishes were very rich and yummy. Starters were lovely, too, as was the desserr - and potions were generous. Brekfast offeed a wide choice and, again, was plntiful. Our room was spottlessly clean and quiet. Wifi worked well  email sign-in needed to activate it.  Sined and Emma at reception were very helpful and welcoming.

title: Enjoyable place to eat.
review: Dear bigpad69,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your stay with us. "Old fashioned Charm" is certainly what we strive for her at the hotel so we are delighted with that apt description!! I will pass your wonderful comments on the food to the chef and his team, they will certainly appreciate the comments as they are constantly working on the menus with this in mind. Sinead and Emma will also be delighted with your comments as all our staff are a huge asset to the hotel so I do hope that we will see you back in the near future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Overnight Stay
review: I booked this accommodation for a bargain, and after 33 hours travelling from the other side of the world, I was so relieved to find our room had a bath.  I slept well and woke up the next morning with no jet lag, ready to explore.  While the hotel is a bit tired, I think it's value for money.  There is a supermarket up the road on the same side and the restaurant provided yummy meals. For my very first experiences in Ireland, my stay in this small town was pleasant.

title: Nice hotel with good food............just be carefull
review: Stayed last weekend as a party of 4 and have to say had some of the nicest food I have ever had, hotel is very clean and the rooms are of good quality. The underground car park is quite tight and dark but thankfully my car was still there the next day.   Unfortunately we were subject to an incident at the Bar where a “local” who had clearly had too much to drink threatened us. Not going to go into detail but a warning to others that there appears to be a sinister element drinks in the bar. Was reported to the hotel at the time and followed up by an email but unfortunately the management have appeared to turn a blind eye to it. Whilst I appreciate that a Hotel can be responsible for what a patron says there are responsible for his behaviour yet he was continued to be served…

title: Decent stay
review: Dear Michael G,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel and I am delighted that your impressions and initial experience were very positive. I am so sorry that you were subjected to any abuse at all and I would love the opportunity to speak directly with you regarding these events. I am aware that my assistant had left messages but if you could please email me directly for correspondence: georgina@brackencourt.ie I look forward to hearing form you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Could do better
review: Stayed here for a couple of nights recently, and enjoyed it. It's a decent hotel.  First the positives: Bracken Grill - very nice meal there, in very pleasant surroundings; parking underground - very handy and included in price; suite - quite spacious; staff were pleasant.  Other points - we have stayed in a number of 4-star hotels and unfortunately this one didn't quite measure up, in our view. We upgraded to a suite and whilst it was spacious, we didn't feel it had the feel and quality of a 4-star hotel. The bed was comfortable but the furniture was rather old-fashioned. The landing at night was dark, with very little lighting; on the roof, there were some benches for smokers to sit and smoke. However, a coffee cup and filled ashtray remained on the bench the whole time we…

title: Excellent
review: Dear weemouse0802,  Many thanks for your review of the hotel, it is very much appreciated. It is only through these channels that we can constantly monitor and if necessary improve the standards that we have in place. Thank you for your lovely comments on the food and the surroundings, chef and his team are very proud of their menu. The parking is a big plus and yes, our staff are certainly a big asset to us. I will take all your feedback and bring this to the attention of our maintenance and housekeeping team as these very valid points will need to be addressed with urgency so thank you again for posting the review. We do hope that you will return to visit again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Really Good
review: We stayed here over Easter hols as we wanted to visit  Funtasia but  not stay in Drogheda.  On arrival we parked in hotel underground carppark which didn't seem to have a lift to the hotel so we had to manage kids and luggage up 2 flights of stairs. Manageable but a lift would definitely help.  I had booked a family room and although it wasn't ready when we arrived this was not a problem for us as we were early. The receptionist was so friendly and directed us to the bar for drinks. We went in and ordered some soft drinks and had just sat down when she came in to find us and tell us our room was ready when we had finished. The bar was cold but we weren't for staying so it didn't bother us too much.  Our room was v spacious there was a double bed a single for the 7 year old and a…

title: Miss
review: Had a great stay here for 5 days.even with a hangover from Hell,due to drinking in the hotel bar,(which stayed open until we dropped)I still dragged myself up for the wonderful breakfast which I could not miss for world.

title: ANOTHER Excellent Stay
review: Dear nikib2,  Thank you so much for your review of the hotel after your recent visit. I do hope that you have gotten over your dreadful hangover at this stage and are felling better!! I am delighted to hear that your five days here at the hotel was such a success and that you enjoyed our hospitality to the fullest!! I do hope that you will return in the near future to enjoy again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: wedding reception
review: We stayed in the hotel at end of December (2 Couples).  Everything was excellent again . this is our 3rd visit and will be back.  Food, Staff, Cleanliness of rooms all excellent. Other times we ate in restaurant which is excellent but this time we tried the bar food and it was also excellent quality and service.  Thanks again for another lovely stay.

title: Family break, Mother's Day weekend.
