review: Dear Co_AntrimJenny,  Many thanks for your recent review of the hotel after yet another successful stay. Thank you also for your continued loyalty and we are thrilled that you continue to visit and especially that you had another lovely stay. We have introduced new bar and restaurant menus and both are receiving great reviews so I am glad that you all had time to enjoy. We look forward to welcoming you back for your next stay in the not too distant future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Hidden gem
review: I just want to highly recommend this hotel to my fellow future bride and grooms, we had our wedding reception here recently and I can't thank the hotel enough the food was outstanding the level of service we recieved was second to none they couldn't do enough for us or our guest who are all still raving about just how good the staff and food was. The wedding team were a dream to work with from the start and helped us with every question and concern or request we had.

title: Most Helpful Staff.
review: Stayed Sunday to Tuesday over Easter. Staff very friendly, arrived prior to check in and there was no fuss, we were asked if we would mind waiting 20 minutes and a room would be available. We had dinner included one night and forgot the voucher and the hostess said there was no need to return to our room to retrieve it, again no fuss. Portions were plentiful and tasty, waiting staff very friendly and helpful even though the restaurant was very busy on Easter Sunday. The room was spacious and the bathroom was very clean, adequate towels etc and very clean. When calling reception to ask about local restaurants etc the staff were very helpful. Parking was free also. Ideal spot to base yourself from if you wish to visit Newgrange, Tayto Park etc.

title: Great value
review: Dear Kelly W,  Many thanks for your recent review after your stay over the Easter weekend. The title of your review is exactly what we want our guests to experience and I am so delighted that you found the staff in all areas to be so friendly and accommodating, they certainly are a credit to us. Our family rooms are certainly spacious which helps when travelling with children so it is great to hear that you had a relaxing stay. We are a great base for visiting these attractions and maybe next time you stay, you will experience some more. We look forward to seeing you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Fabulous three days
review: Smart, clean great value hotel. Room was more like a suite than a room. Clean and tidy throughout, nice bathroom. Food was top class, bar busy and open till late. Staff were friendly and professional and the female ones were all good looking

title: Irish Hospitality at it's very best
review: Dear Ronnie C,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel, it is very much appreciated. It certainly seems like you enjoyed your stay in every way which is fantastic to hear. Our rooms are very diverse her at the hotel so no two are the same and yes, they are indeed very spacious. The chef will also be very pleased with your "top class" comment and I will pass on your lovely comments to all of the team, especially the female ones!!! We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Sunday stay
review: We had a three day trip with David Urquhart Travel.  We found the hotel fabulous. Food excellent, room 309 lovely, The service from the  bar,  waitresses,  waiters and the reception  staff was  wonderful. We could not fault a thing. Thank you to all concerned.

title: stay for wedding reception
review: We stayed previously 3 years ago and again chose to stay here for another wedding reception. Again faultless! 17th to 20th March 2016. The staff are polite, happy and professional. The food was excellent.  Location was easy to get into Dublin. Convenient for airport. If your in this area. Do not pass on the chance to stay here.

title: Mid Range Really
review: Dear Richard S,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review the hotel after your return visit for yet another joyous occasion!! Faultless is excellent and thank you very much for your kind comments and feedback. Once again, our staff making your stay even more enjoyable, they will be delighted with your feedback. This is indeed a very strong recommendation and we certainly look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Excellent service
review: On the down side, not very clean, carpets and paint in every hallway needs to be replaced IMMEDIATELY, double room with towels for one, the toiletries were sparse and the breakfast setup was poor kept on running out of water for the tea and coffee which you had to get yourself. On the plus side, was the staff very friendly and helpful, the room and bathroom were spacious, the food was good, its location in the centre of the town was ideal, car parking provided. To conclude what the hotel needs is some competition being the only hotel in the locality it leads to ah sure it will do.....

title: Lovely hotel
review: Dear DublinMiller,  Many thanks for your recent review of the hotel. I was very happy to hear that you found all the staff very friendly and helpful, as you will see from previous reviews, they really are a credit to us. Our rooms are certainly spacious and accommodating and are very popular. I am however disappointed to hear that you feel we have adopted the above attitude as this is certainly very far from the truth. We are very aware of competition near and far and as we are the only hotel in the town, we try to make it exclusive but I am sorry if you did not find this to be true. We are in the middle of routine maintenance and are painting throughout and replacement for floors and walls so hopefully on your next visit, you will see a difference. We look forward to welcoming you again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Grubby, Smelly and more like 2*
review: Was a guest at a wedding last weekend. The service was absolutely excellent. Everyone of the staff went out of their way to ensure that the wedding went perfectly. They couldn't be faulted in the slightest. I can't recommend this hotel high enough.

title: Loved it
review: Myself and my husband stayed here for a night and loved it. Comfortable and cosy. Great breakfast. Good town with good people and plenty of bars and restaurants. Will definitely be back. Try here and I bet you'll be back.

title: Great stay
review: Dear heffernan_pauline,  Thank you so much for your recent review of the hotel as it is only through these channels that we can constantly monitor, review and if necessary improve on our standards and procedures. Thank you for your very kind comments and the best part of your review is to hear that you will definitely be back to our lovely hotel and great town of Balbriggan. We certainly look forward to welcoming you back in the very near future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Top Class Hotel
review: Booked this as a family break for my brothers birthday. We had 6 rooms in total ranging from family rooms to a room for my elderly parents. Got a cheap deal on group on but cheap in price certainly doesn't mean cheap in standards. From staff, bedrooms and the best meal I've ever had it was brilliant, music in the bar, excellent, well done Bracken Court.

title: Lovely wee break away
review: Dear Honor102,  Many thanks for taking the time to post a review of the hotel afetr your recent celebration with extended family. We do special offers all the time with various deal sites and I am really happy that you have pointed out that there is no effect on the standards here at the hotel. I am also delighted that you found all aspects of your stay so satisfying and the food being the best you have ever had. We look forward to welcoming back to the hotel.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: A very salty experience
review: My family of two kids and my husband stayed here recently and had a really good time. From the front desk staff all the way through to the bar staff, everyone is so friendly and welcoming. We got married here almost four years ago and we had the most amazing day, also made better by the staff. I would highly recommend this hotel for both family or for a couple. Food is always beautiful and very fresh, also the bar always has a great athmosphere in it. Cannot wait for my next stay here.

title: Can't Fault again
review: We stayed in Bracken Court for 3 nights and really can't fault our stay again. The food and staff always make the stay. Room was lovely, spacious and comfortable. Very relaxing stay, would recommend highly to everyone. Good location and easy to get to City Centre.

title: First class hotel
review: Dear KrisandJon,  Thank you very much for your recent review of the hotel and judging by the title of your review, it is not your first time staying with us so thank you for your continued loyalty. I am delighted to hear that the food and the staff always make your stay as the two elements are equally important and we constantly strive to maintain our standard in both areas and all the team will very much appreciate your comments. I do hope that you will be returning again soon and we look forward to seeing you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: friendly honest staff
review: My wife and I have just returned from a 3 night stay in this first class hotel  The staff were very helpful the food was excellent and the bedroom large and comfortable The hotel although 20 miles from Dublin is served by a rail  service which is only a few minutes from the hotel  The Bracken Grill is very good and is reasonable priced

title: room
review: Dear David i,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent stay with us. Our staff are always mentioned in reviews as they are a credit to the hotel and we are very proud of them, they will also be delighted by your kind comments. I am also very happy to hear that found the food at the hotel excellent as we are presently launching new menus and the chef is very grateful for any feedback. We are very lucky to have such a convenient rail station on our doorstep which is brillaint for trips into Dublin and I am delighted to hear that you could relax and unwind in your large and comfortable bedroom after your trip. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Opeartions Manager

title: Fabulous stay
review: nice bar and eating area room was spacious and mainly clean carpet was good quality but to many stains and black marks that could easily have been cleaned off bathroom was clean except for toilet black at bend not nice to look at thats the only bad points had a very relaxing stay with good food ate in the restaurant on first night and bar food second night prices were reasonable but thought 27 euro was a bit much for a bottle of pino grecio all in all good value hotel with friendly staff would return

title: twix mas 2015
review: went to the bracken court for my hubby and my friends 50th.we booked 2 rooms and were delighted to have been allocated 2 suits.the rooms were perfect.staff were very friendly ,food was high quality.will be back.thanks.

title: Attention To Detail Not Great / Noisy
review: Dear Doloressmyth,  Thank you so much for your review of the hotel, all feedback is very much appreciated. It is really great to hear that you had such a successful stay with us. Firstly, thank you for choosing the hotel for your recent celebrations. We do try and upgrade our guests as much as we can when we know that there is a special occasion so I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed the upgrade. I will pass on all your lovely comments to the staff and the chef and we do look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Good standard hotel with very friendly and attentive staff
review: Front desk staff v polite and a nice welcome, including a fire.  However I asked for a quiet room and we were given a room overlooking the main street which was very loud. (it was a Sunday night, so this should not have been an issue at all !) We arrived and the heating was on full, so we had to open window to sleep (no a/c!)  Also the insulation between rooms is terrible !! Worst of any hotel I have stayed in, ever!  The couple in room next to us were shouting and making noise from 2 until 4.20am (we were both up again at 6.30 for work so got little sleep) and it was like they were in our room.  Bed was okay, but not great.  Decoration was not great.  Did not eat.  Overall, for me this is a 3 star hotel, not the advertised 4 star.  Proof of the pudding is in the eating - we had…

title: Nice Hotel and friendly staff
review: Dear Hotelstays1,  Many thanks for your recent review of the hotel, it is very much appreciated. It is vitally important to us that we receive all feedback and comments on reservations as it is only through these channels that we can constantly monitor and if necessary review our standards throughout the hotel. I am so sorry that your request was not met on this occasion and that you were not accommodated with a room away from the street and noise. Maybe we could have arranged a room move for you if this was brought to our attention on the evening in question but I absolutely take your comments on board and will investigate to see why this happened. I will also pass all your comments on insulation and air conditioning onto our maintenance team and management for review. I am truly sorry that your sleep was disturbed on this occasion but I do hope that you will consider returning. Please do feel free to contact me directly to arrange any special requirements you may have in the future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Decent hotel
review: As they always say no point in having nice premises if the staff aren't up to it. Well, here  everything falls into place. The hotel is in a good location not too far outside of Dublin (and on the right side of the airport), of good standard with nicely appointed room. And the staff really make it by being very attentive. We booked an overnight B&B & dinner package and fell in for the hotel's Christmas party, which was a great "do". Staff couldn't have been any friendlier and helpful. Well done - we'll be back.Just to note also the rates are very agreeable.

title: Food disappointing.
review: We had an overnight stay with dinner booked , but  we were offered the chance to join one of their party nights.So we decided to accept.The hotel on arrival looked nice enough with Christmas trees and decorations.The staff were pleasant and welcoming,the room was warm and tidy though a little dated ,carpet a bit grubby in places .And so to the Christmas party.Food not good , reheated turkey and ham under cooked vegetables very hard.Only nice thing was the soup.Very disappointing.Maybe we should have gone to the restaurant,we will never know.The entertainment and the craic however saved the night.Also room smelt of smoking during the night.

title: €36 for Brekfast......complete rip off!!!!!
review: Dear Alfe 15,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel, it is very much appreciated. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed the ambience at the hotel on arrival and that you found the staff to be friendly and welcoming. I am however very disappointed to hear that you did not enjoy the food so much during your stay. I can assure you that there is no food item reheated on any of our menus but we do take all feedback very seriously and I will certainly bring this to the chefs attention. I do hope that, as you mentioned, you did have a good night in the end that this will not stop you from returning again. I look forward to welcoming you again at the hotel.  Kind Regards,  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Wouldn't recommend
review: I stayed at this hotel last Saturday night with my husband for my birthday. On arrivel we were very please with the warm welcome at the hotel, the staff are lovely. We had a very quick check in and were nicely surprised at our beautiful room.....it was really big with a nice seating area......only downside was we had a disabled bathroom, therefore no bath......  We had a lovely eveing in the hotel bar, brilliant band.  We filled out the brekfast menu that was left in out room and handed in at reception for room delivery the following morning. The menu stated that there was a €4 each charge for room delivery.When the breakfast arrived the following morning my husband was charged €36........this is an absolute outrage......you could get an earlybird dinner in some places for that…

title: Don't expect any luxury !!
review: Dear Eimear W,  Many thanks for taking the time to post a review of the hotel, we really do appreciate this as it is only through these channels that we can monitor and if necessary improve our standards and procedures. It is fantastic to hear that you had such a great stay, found the staff all friendly and welcoming and of course enjoyed your room. Regarding the bath, please do state your preference next time you book with us and we will ensure that we allocate a room with a bath for you. I will certainly observe your comments regarding the breakfast cards and we will make the necessary changes so that other guests may not get an unpleasant surprise. Please do contact me directly on your next reservation and thank you again for your kind comments.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Great, if you hate sleeping
review: Stopped here for 1 night, first impressions were good. Big spacious room. Ordered breakfast to be sent up to the room for 10am. 10.50 still no sign of it, rang down to reception and apparantly they had lost the order. Not really a big deal but if I order something and pay for it I expect it to be delivered.  On another note the drinks we ordered to the room at 9.30 arrived just after we ordered them and then again at 11am. Obviously a lack of communication somewhere. Staff are pleasent enough though.

title: great hotel but would need a makeover
review: Stayed in the bracken court on 6th November for the weekend.  The staff were excellent and could not do enough for you. Food was very good and the breakfast was great. We were in rooms 208 and 209 which were very noisy as they overlooked a smoking area and as there was a wedding on in the hotel on the Saturday night the noise went on until 4am.  The carpet in room 209 was very badly stained and would most certainly need replaced apart from that the rooms were very clean and a great size.  All said I would return to this hotel again but not to these rooms.

title: Comfortable,good value.
review: Dear mcgac,  Many thanks for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your stay, it is only through these channels that we can constantly maintain and review standards where necessary. I am delighted to hear that you found our staff so welcoming, they really are our biggest accolade here in the hotel and we are extremely proud of them and they will appreciate this feedback. I will also pass your very kind comments onto the chef and his team regarding their food. I am however so sorry to hear that you were disturbed during your stay by our other guests and when you do return, please do contact me directly and we will try and accommodate you on a higher floor away from the party zone! I will also note your observations with our maintenance team. I do look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel.  Kind Regards,  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Average stay
review: Friendly welcome and the room was very spacious if a bit old fashioned. Could not turn off one radiator as was under a cover and made a constant noise when the heating was on. The bar and restaurant are more modern and the bar food was fine and so was the breakfast. Ok for a short stay.

title: OK For A One/Two Night Stay But Not Longer
review: Dear Kevin O,  Thank you so much for your recent review of the hotel. We do appreciate all feedback and comments. I am delighted to hear that your welcome to the hotel was friendly, we are very proud of our team here for their friendly and professional attitude. The rooms are indeed very spacious and we have decorated with "homely" in mind but we do appreciate all comments even if not to your personal liking but noted nonetheless. I am also glad that you enjoyed the other outlets in the hotel and breakfast was satisfactory. I do hope that we will see you here again in the near future albeit for a short stay.  Kind Regards,  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Very happy experience
review: We visited Bracken court hotel in July 2015 and had a average to nice stay. Rooms are cozy and clean. Our room did not had a good view as it looked out on the roof. Breakfast was average but the dinners very good. Hotel is directly on the street, not close to the sea.

title: Lovely family hotel, excellent staff
review: We stayed here on a living social deal for two nights end of Oct.  The hotel is lovely and the staff are excellent, the desk staff helped us with directions to the nearest shopping centre in Swords ( great pennies), they also advised and printed out train times for a trip to the Guinness factory.  We had a double room which was lovely but a bit cold in the evening as the radiator wasn't on. The food in the hotel restaurant is Devine, we got a three course meal and wine with our voucher and they food was so good we ate there the second night ( tip if you eat before  7 they have a deal for 25 euro per person 3 courses and wine). My husband was unwell during our meal ( too much Guinness) the lovely waitress gave us a box with our meal in it to take up to the room and another member…

title: amazing
review: Dear karma-xx,  Thank you so much for posting a review of the hotel after your recent visit. It really is great to hear that you enjoyed your stay so much and that you are looking forward to return visit. Our staff here at the hotel certainly are a huge asset and we are very aware of this but I will certainly pass on your very kind comments to all the team as they do appreciate this greatly. The chef and his team will also be delighted that you found the food so enticing that you came back for more on your second evening!! We are very accessible to shopping centres and theme parks as mentioned so I do hope that you will return at a later date with your family so you can discover more. We all look forward to seeing you soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Great for wheelchairs
review: we recently had our wedding reception in this venue and i must say the treatment we recieved from all members of staff was exceptionally good they were friendly and courteous and bent over backwards to ensure our day was perfect. the food was incredible as was the accomodation. thanks to all in the bracken court we loved everything as did all our guests. look forward to going back again. mike and audrey mc namara

title: Best of both worlds
review: Dear Mike M,  Thank you so much for posting a review of the hotel after the very joyous occasion of yourself and Audrey's wedding. I did have the absolute pleasure of dealing with yourselves on the lead up to your special day and I know that Conor and the team also had the pleasure of looking after you on the day. Your kind comments regarding the team here at the hotel are very much appreciated and we know how much of a difference  our staff make to the experience enjoyed by all at the hotel. I will also pass on your compliments to the chef, he will be delighted. I do hope that yourself and Audrey will visit again soon and that married life id treating you both well.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Fantastic wedding venue and lovely restaurant
review: Excellent hotel for some one in a wheelchair. The staff were friendly and helpfull. The room for the disabled was first class with all that a wheelchair user would require. Dinner was great. The only few things i would say is that some of the carpets were overdue a clean, and the breakfast was over cooked. Over all a great hotel and I would have no problem staying there again.

title: We will be back
review: Bracken Court Hotel is friendly + welcoming + the staff are very helpful.Balbriggan is a good place to explore also with a beach +harbour.the food is good in the hotel +the bar prices are reasonable even compared to nearby bars.There was entertainment in the bar on Friday night + this was a real treat.The room was clean + well equipped + comfortable.The reception staff were very helpful.It is also handy for the Dublin train.

title: Great Stay
review: Dear Ann K,  Thank you so much for your recent review of the hotel, we appreciate all feedback through these channels. It is great to hear that you liked Balbriggan and surrounding areas for your short break and yes, we are very accessible to Dublin with the train station just minutes away. Thank you for your comments on the staff and food, they are very welcome as this is exactly what we are striving for here at the hotel. Our bar is very reasonably priced all right and this is with our loyal customers foremost in our mind. I am delighted to hear that you will be back and we look forward to welcoming you again very soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Comfort and convenience
review: I have just returned from a great weekend break here, based on recommendations from friends. The hotel was very easy found & the free car parking facilities are great, right below the hotel.  The staff were very welcoming, couldn't have been more helpful &  nothing was a bother to them.  Our room was spacious, clean & very comfortable. The beds were spotless & the bathroom perfectly clean.  We had a 3 course meal on Friday night in the restaurant, which included an amazingly perfect cooked steak! Breakfast is also served here, although everything not to my taste was the perfect start to a day of exploring. Angered me though that on Saturday morning a young fella was working, showed us to our tables, was arranging room service orders, organising us hot drinks, generally was busy,…

title: A very good place to rest for the adventures around
review: Dear Claire546,  Many thanks for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent visit. I was delighted to hear that you found the hotel so accessible and the parking so convenient. Thank you for your very kind comments regarding our staff on their friendliness and efficiency, they are a fantastic asset to the hotel and they will be very appreciative of these comments. Our food and menu choice has been recently changed with a new team in the kitchen so they will also be delighted to hear that you enjoyed the food so much. Our Jack Doyles bar is always a hit with guests and locals alike, glad you enjoyed the ambiance. I can only apologise profoundly for the very unfortunate experience you had at breakfast and I can assure you that I will fully investigate this. I do hope that you will return to us at a future date and we look forward to welcoming you.  Kind Regards,  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Amazing
review: My wife and I, both retired, stayed here for three nights in early October. The hotel is clean and comfortable, and our bedroom was very large. The bar and restaurant are very pleasant and the service, and food, excellent. There is a hotel car park right beside the hotel. You really have great choice for activities as there are so many things of interest within easy driving distance. You can visit pleasant towns and beaches along the coast, or head inland for the likes of Newgrange and other notable sights in the Boyne Valley. Trips into Dublin couldn't be easier with the train station about 5 mins walk away from where you can have stress free travel to the city centre in about 35 mins. All staff are helpful and friendly and we will definitely return.

title: Family Holiday
review: Fantastic Hotel, Great food, Very Clean, Staff Friendly and very helpful. Went for a family holiday and the hotel staff looked after us really well. would always go back. Only thing its missing is a pool but beach is few mins walk away. Wouldn't have any complaints.

title: Very Nice
review: Dear Chris M,  Many thanks for your recent review of the hotel after your family break, it is very much appreciated. I was delighted to see that you enjoyed all aspects of the hotel and found it very clean and the staff so welcoming. I will pass your comments onto the Head Chef who will be very pleased that you enjoyed our food so much. Most importantly, it is fantastic that you will always return so we look forward to welcoming you again. I will also pass on your feedback regarding the pool, it certainly would be a welcome addition!!  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings   Operations Manager

title: Fantastic!
review: Staff very nice, service minded and quite prompt in answering questions or solving problems. Room service was super fast. Breakfast was well varied and quite nice to have a chef serve you and cool your eggs to order right then and there. Room was large and super clean. Highly recommend

title: Another fantastic experience at the Bracken Court
review: Dear J E,  Thank you for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent visit. I am so happy that you found the staff so helpful and always willing to help, we are extremely proud of the team here and they always appreciate comments such as yours. I am also delighted that you found your room spacious and clean, the rooms are very comfortable. I do hope that you will return to us again on your travels.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Pit Stop on way to Ferry back to Wales
review: Stayed here in september.   Room was lovely. Stayed in 314. Staff very nice and breakfast superb. Parking is free and secure, wifi is free and signsl is good and strong throughout hotel.Very close to Dublin too. Highly reccomend! Will be back  Highly re

title: Mediocre
review: Have just spent 3 nights in the Bracken Court and while the staff were great and the room was fine although so big it would benefit from a larger screen TV as difficult to see it from the bed, the food was disappointing. My favourite part of a hotel break is the breakfast and I was sadly disappointed by the offering here. Everything was tasteless and dried up apart from the eggs which were fried to order and I ended up just having fruit and toast. The dinner wasn't much better being average at best. All in all not what I expect from a 4star hotel and I definitely would not hurry back.

title: Amazing hotel for a Wedding... Especially for my brother Liam and his partner Stuart.
review: Dear Heather 421,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your recent visit. I am glad that you found all the team here at the hotel friendly and accommodation to your liking, our rooms are very diverse here and some of them are quite large but I will certainly pass on your feedback regarding the television size. I intend to speak with chef regarding all your comments on the food as I am sure that he will be greatly disappointed. He is new on board and presently designing exciting new menus so I do hope that you will return to us again and experience some of our upcoming changes.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: FuntSia family deal
review: Having been at a lot of wedding in Ireland and around the world... Have to say the Bracken Court is the one to beat.. Conor and Georgina and all the staff in the hotel couldn't have made it a better day. The food was amazing and the attention to detail was second to none... Well done.. Highly recommend it for a special occasion.

title: Friendly and welcoming
review: Dear Gretta27,  Thank you so much for your recent post on the hotel after the very happy occasion of Liam and Stuart's wedding, what a day!!. I am delighted that you enjoyed your day so much on this joyous occasion. We are very proud of our weddings here at the hotel and our team that make everything so perfect. I had the pleasure of looking after you all on the day along with Conor so I will pass on your very kind comments to him and the team. Hopefully, we will see you here at the hotel again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: My best friends wedding
review: We stayed in a family room, but as soon as we walked inside the room we got a awful smell of cigerate smoke, as the smoking room was directly under us. There was a lot of stains on the carpet. Other than that the hotel was ok, nice breakfast in the morning.

title: Good base for short break
review: Spacious room, clean & well serviced daily. Staff helfull & friendly. Convenient to beach, harbour, train station & many restaurants & takeaways. Balbriggan itself has a lot of graffiti & is a little run down which is a great pity as the people are friendly & the area has such potential. There is a lovely beach & the harbour has resident seals. WiFi was better than any other hotel I've experienced. No choice disturbance even on a night when a wedding party was ongoing.

title: A nice place to stay
review: Dear Jane M,  Thank you so much for your recent review of the hotel and Balbriggan after your stay with us. It is refreshing to hear that you found all the staff helpful and friendly and that your room was both spacious and clean. I do appreciate what you have said about Balbriggan but there are many exciting projects in progress at the moment to improve on all the issues you have mentioned as we do have a great town here full of friendly people! I am also glad that you noticed the strength of our WIFI as we have invested alot in this for our guests. I do hope that we will see you again here at the hotel and we look forward to welcoming you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Good value in good location to break journey
review: The Bracken Court Hotel is a nice hotel situated in the town centre of Balbriggan, thirty minutes drive north of Dublin, and less than ten minutes walk from the beach. We had a nice size room which was clean but with a bit dated décor. There is a really good restaurant in the hotel, a recently refurbished bar adjacent to the reception area and a free car park. This would have been a four star review if we hadn't had a problem checking in. Having made an unpaid pre-booking we arrived to find that the Visa machine wasn't working due to a nationwide issue. We had already given our Visa card details along with our vehicle registration but were advised that we could not be checked in without payment and that we would have to go down the road to withdraw the money at the nearest…

title: We coming Staff
review: Dear Martin B,  Let me start by thanking you for writing a review of the hotel after your recent stay with us. It is great to hear that you had a good time and the staff and hotel were all to your liking but I do have to apologise for the very unfortunate experience you had on checking in. You are absolutely right when you say that a better approach could have been thought of and the fact that it was our equipment, we should have made allowances and made your check in easier. I will certainly pass this feedback onto our front office manager but I do apologise again. I hope this will not deter you from returning for another stay.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Overnight stay
review: We have been to this hotel before so having enjoyed our visit we were happy to return. The furnishings are just starting to get tired and perhaps house-keeping needs a word. There was a party in the hotel on our first night and the stairs were not cleaned while we were there.? Check-in was quick and easy with a friendly receptionist! Rooms were clean and comfortable. We dined in the Grill Restaurant and the food was very good. Our waitress was very pleasant and helpful.  To be honest the only real complaint was the beeping from the road crossing!! Best getting a room to the rear of the hotel! Still happy to use this hotel again.

title: Good but not 4*
review: We arrived very late in fact early morning and they charged a hearty amount for 6 hours to the checkout time and then told us it would be an extra 10 euro per hour. The room was cosy albeit basic for 4*. I would have not expected plastic condiments in 4* nor would I have expected that when you 'flush' the pipes would produce a very large noise for about 5 minutes. Staff were nice and very helpful so cant fault them there. Overall they where 2-3* and not 4* as the rooms need some work.

title: some staff need people skills
review: Dear PaddyOByrne,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your visit. It is great to hear that you found all the staff friendly and helpful. I am however very sorry to hear that you had an uncomfortable stay, I will investigate the said pipes and get our maintenance team straight on this so I do apologise. I am also sorry to hear that you did not find the facilities a four star standard, we are constantly working to maintain our standard and carrying out the necessary refurbishment for this. Hopefully, you will visit us again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Excellent hotel!!
review: Front desk staff very pleasant check in was bit slow rooms weren't ready due to wedding the night before rooms were basic bit outdated carpets needs cleaning in quite a bit of the hotel  breakfast first morn wasnt nice but 2nd morn was better would have like to served myself instead of begrudged asking for an extra sausage. Diner wasnt exactly the best starters great then it went down hill restaurant staff were a1 though couldnt do enough to apologise.Bar staff great excellent service nice atmosphere .

title: Very nice hotel and great staff
review: Dear Esther 1916,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel. It is great to hear that you found almost all of the staff very helpful and friendly and classed them as A1, thank you and I will pass your lovely compliments onto the team. However, I was so sorry to hear that your room felt a little outdated but we are in the middle of plans for refurbishment presently so we do hope to see you back at the hotel. Regarding your breakfast experience, I shall speak with the head chef and his team and can assure you that this will be addressed. Many thanks again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Very out dated
review: I've just spent a weekend in this hotel & found it to to be excellent value for money. The hotel is nicely decorated in a traditional theme & is spotlessly clean. The staff were very helpful & friendly. The restaurant is also decorated to a high standard & the food was lovely.  The bar is well priced at only €4.10 for a pint of Guinness & serves traditional bar food which is also lovely with good portion sizes.  The wifi is free too which is a bonus & the connectivity is good throughout the hotel.   We stayed in room 405 which was a good size with a large bathroom including a bath & a walk in shower. There was also an iron, ironing board, trouser press & proper hair dryer already in the room.   It is only a few minutes walk from Balbriggan train station & the beach, although…

title: Wedding event
review: Stayed for 2 nights at the Bracken for a wedding at the hotel, lovely atmosphere and the staff are very friendly. The rooms are basic but clean, the only crumble I had was that there was no air con and I found the hotel to be quite warm. Only ate breakfast at the hotel and it was delicious! Overall great hotel would defiantly stay again 😀

title: Great location for my morning airport run
review: Dear RoisinJ23,  Many thanks for your review of the hotel after your recent visit for the happy occasion of a wedding. I am delighted to hear that you had such a good time and the atmosphere was great. Our staff are a huge asset to the hotel so I am glad that you found the all so friendly. I will pass on your comments to the chef regarding his breakfast, i am sure that he will be very pleased that you enjoyed it so much. Regarding the air conditioning, I know the hotel can seem warm on occasions, we do try to get the right balance for most people but I will certainly take your feedback on board. Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Needs an update
review: From my arrival at the spacious free underground car park, to my breakfast the following morning, I had a very pleasant stay here. The staff are all absolutely lovely, very helpful and informative, and have an evident pride and enjoyment in their place of work. My room was spacious, with a nicely refurbished bathroom - lots of glittering granite and a huge Irish bathtub, perfect for my last night, after a long rainy drive cross-country. Towels were large, plentiful and fluffy - all qualities I appreciate! The bed was very comfortable, there were 4 pillows, and 2 extra in the wardrobe. There's a mini fridge, iron, trouser press, tea and coffee making facilities all right there for you too. I think my only negative would be the lack of a net curtain or window screen - the room was…

title: Quick break
review: Dear sjgiants,  Thank you so much for your recent review of the hotel after your short stay with us before your airport run! I was delighted to hear that all the team here made you feel so welcome and were informative, looking after all your requirements. They are a huge asset and we appreciate this, hence their pride in the hotel. I was also delighted to hear that our rooms were fully equipped with all that you appreciate and that you had such a comfortable stay. I will pass on your comments regarding a netting or screen, point well made, thank you. Most importantly we look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel on your next journey and thank you once again for your review.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Wedding disaster...  Classic Menu wedding package & €6.00 a glass of wine?
review: The rooms need an update (they smell like they were once smoking rooms) and there is not much to do in Balbriggan. Free underground parking was nice. Pub food and service was also good. Good place to stay before heading to the airport the next morning if you have a car.

title: Excellent Value for money
review: Booked this hotel for airport stopover,very pleasantly surprised nice spacious rooms and very friendly staff. Didn't have breakfast so can't comment on that however 12  o clock check out was appreciated.

title: Friendly staff, tired decor.
review: Dear wee_Scottish_Andy,  Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of our hotel. It is great to hear that you found the hotel excellent value for money and that you were pleasantly surprised by our spacious rooms and of course, our friendly staff. It is a shame you did not get a chance to taste our breakfast  but the 12pm checkout ensured that you a good sleep! As a first time visitor to the hotel, I am delighted that you enjoyed it so much and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: great value weekend
review: We stayed in August, the check in was friendly and quick. But the decor of the hotel is a very tired, our bathroom in particular with cracked sink, brown shower seals, broken flush handle and toilet seat surface worn through etc ( no excuse ikea only down the road for a new seat :) ) This was room 204 if management would like to check the issues out.

title: Natalie and collie wedding
review: Dear Anthony D,  Thank you so much for your review of the hotel, we appreciate all feedback. We can constantly monitor our guests observations and comments and make the necessary improvements. I am delighted that you found the staff friendly and efficient, however I am terribly sorry to hear that you found the decor tired and your pictures convey clearly the issues you had during your stay. I have passed these onto the maintenance and management team here at the hotel and we will attend to these fixtures and fittings that you have pointed out, thank you again. I do hope that you will consider returning to the hotel in the future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Holidays
review: Got a great value weekend deal which proved to be very enjoyable. The staff here are both friendly and efficient, going that extra mile to make our stay special. I would thoroughly recommend The Bracken Court for a relaxing break.

title: Decent hotel
review: I stayed in this hotel for almost half a year for a project in Balbriggan. All in all the experience was good. Clean rooms,  friendly staff,  good bar and restaurant, breakfast not bad. A few things leave room for improvement: - water for the shower to get hot takes a long time in some rooms - breakfast only starts at 7:30  - when there's a party with music you can 'enjoy' it in all the rooms

title: Revitalizing
review: Dear Mark S,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after such a long time spent with us, it is greatly appreciated. I am delighted to hear that you found the hotel overall decent with good facilities. Your observations have been noted and will be brought to the attention of responsible departments for improvement. Thank you once again and hopefully you will stay with us again on future business.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Pretty good
review: I only stayed for one night, but this hotel easily gets top marks from me as I had wanted nothing more than to be back home as I entered (unpleasant leaving the airport and in the taxi), yet left the next day wanting to stay longer and feeling good again.  There was some noise as a band was playing, but I can sleep through those things fine, and anyway I was on that side, on the first floor, so perhaps higher up and/or being on the other side of the hotel would be quiet.  A very quick, easy but friendly check-in.  Spacious room, warm/homely feel, and a comfy big bed.  Helpful, friendly lady at reception in the morning. Good choice of breakfast (and what I had was very tasty); help yourself to some cereal, yogurt, a choice of drinks, etc. and/or get some warm food quickly and…

title: Wow just pathetic
review: Dear Leanne M,  Many thanks for your recent review of the hotel. I am delighted to hear that you had such a great stay with us and especially that you would definitely return. Home form home is exactly what we aim for and I am glad that you felt so revitalized after your short stay. I will pass your observations on breakfast to the chef, he will be delighted that you enjoyed our food!  The staff here at the hotel are an asset to us and I am glad that you found them efficient and friendly and we do look forward to seeing you again soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Great Staff! Super impressed.
review: Stayed in the bracken court on the 12th and 13th of July. Arrived at half 2 hoping our room would be ready, but it wasn't which we didn't mind as we knew check in was 3. The girl on the desk said she would let us know when it was ready and we waited in the bar. At around 10 past 3 I went out to check and was told it shouldn't be much longer. Normally this wouldn't have bothered us but as we were meeting friends in dublin city centre and it was a Sunday train timetable we were a bit pushed for time as the train was at 4. Around 20 minutes later I went again to reception and explained that we couldn't wait much longer as we had to get a train. We then got our keys went to our room, freshened up and surprisingly made the train. On arriving back later that night we went straight to…

title: weekend break
review: I stayed here for 2 nights August 2015. The location is about as convenient as any could be, very near  the train station, beach,shops  and bus stops. The bedroom was large and the bathroom very modern and clean. . The breakfast was also very tasty. The front desk staff where friendly  and helpful. As was the staff through out this hotel.In my experience, it's easy to provide great service to guests who are happy with everything and aren't having any difficulties. The service we received when there was a hiccup with the booking  is what really impressed me. The hotel Manager Conor took care of our  problem efficiently and QUICKLY.  I would absolutely return to the Bracken Court Hotel and have already recommended it to a couple of friends who plan to visit Dublin soon .

title: Hotel home from hone
review: Dear Pauline 3232,  Many thanks for your recent review of the hotel regarding your weekend break, I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed it so much. You have obviously taken the time to discover our town and surroundings and found the hotel a great base for doing so. Thank you for your recommendations and comments on the food. I notice that you have commented extensively on the staff and service which is exactly what we strive for here at the hotel and I am sure that Conor will be delighted that you found him professional and efficient. Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Great staff, hotel feels a bit tired.
review: We visited Bracken Court on a three night Living Social deal and the value for money was unbelievable.  The rooms are big, clean and comfortable.  The staff were extremely friendly and the food was gorgeous.  The decor could do with a little TLC but certainly wouldn't put us off returning.  Didn't see a spa or fitness suite although these are advertised in the hotel amenities section on Trip Advisor.  We didn't want to use them anyway but it would be best to check with hotel if you would..

title: Bee keeping course
review: Dear Candygirl 156,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel, we do appreciate this very much. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay so much and that your package proved to be such great value for money. I will pass on your comments to the Head Chef and his team and I am sure he will be delighted that you found his food to your liking. The staff here at the hotel are a huge asset and play a huge part in making your stay so comfortable and enjoyable, thank you for bringing this to our attention. I will investigate fully your comments on the fitness suite and spa as we have never had these facilities so I will contact tripadvisor. Thank you once again and I look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Nice Hotel
review: We stayed here on a short break offer which was very good  value for 2 nights b&b plus an evening meal. There were 2 couples in our party, and we had hoped for rooms close together, but ended up at opposite ends of the sprawling hotel. Our evening meal was a set menu for the package as in most hotels, but it was OK, although choice was a bit limited. The breakfasts were good, with all the usual foods on offer. Nothing to get overly excited about, but no worse than most other hotels of this calibre. We found the dining room a bit dark and stuffy. Low ceilings and dim lights coupled with a drab decor scheme combined to make it a place you won't want to linger in. The hotel was refurbished a number of years ago, but the corridors and bedrooms are starting to look a bit tired,…

title: FABULOUS - yet again!!
review: This was my second time here and like the first time it was fabulous! Staff were amazing - nothing is too much problem - we had a slight problem with the first room we were given but it was changed immediately once we pointed out the issue.  We were there for a girlie shopping weekend to celebrate my friend's birthday and it was a lovely touch that there were balloons and a birthday greeting waiting in the room on arrival as well as some extra culinary treats during the most fabulous 3 course dinner I've had in a long time.  Would highly recommend this hotel!! Cx

title: Brilliant Bracken Break
review: Dear Cardell_13,  Many thanks for your recent review on tripadvisor, it is greatly appreciated. I am delighted to hear that this was not your first time staying with us and you had such a successful stay again. As per previous reviews, our staff are a big asset here at the hotel so I shall pass on your lovely comments to the team. We do try and research the reasons why our guests stay so we can add these little extras for special occasions, I am glad that they were appreciated. I will also pass on your comments to the chef regarding your meal, I am so happy that you found the meal so exquisite. We look forward to welcoming you back at the hotel in the near future.  Kind regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Our wedding July 17th
review: Firstly the staff were helpful and friendly - both in the reception and restaurant (especially Lisha). The three course meal was faultless and delicious especially the salmon dish. The staff made a fuss of it being my birthday from balloons in the room, to mango sorbet between the starter and main course!!! I have been here before on a mini break and I will be back!!!

title: Very Enjoyable Stay
review: Dear Linda P,  Thank you for your review of the hotel, it is very much appreciated. Firstly, I am so happy that you found all the staff so friendly and welcoming, we are very proud of our team here at the hotel. We do try and obtain prior information regarding your stay so that we can treat our guests to the little extras, if they are celebrating any kind of event in their lives so I am delighted that you enjoyed our offerings and of course the wonderful food. Most importantly, it is fantastic to hear that you have been here before and will return again. We look forward to welcoming you on your next stay.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Gaps in customer service
review: Would highly recommend the bracken court hotel after having our wedding ceremony and reception there. I have stayed in a lot of hotels and I can honestly say that this by far was my best experience so far. What makes this hotel so great is the staff. They made our day run so smoothly and were extremely helpful and friendly to us and our guests. Special thanks to Connor who went above and beyond in making us so relaxed on what should have been a stressful day. Also Sinead, Georgina and the chef who from the moment we met them till the day itself and after couldn't have been more helpful. Food atmosphere staff rooms and drink was excellent. Thank you so much all at the bracken court hotel will definitely be back. Derek & Selina McClean

title: Avoid if possible
review: Staff unwelcoming,  room musty smell, carpet had dirty marks all over it. Cracked wash basin, toilet dirty and toilet seat all scored. Furniture badly chipped and sticky to touch, needed a good clean. Breakfast terrible, bacon seemed to have been reheated from previous day, pot of coffee not very warm. Obviously we will not return.

title: Worst Night Sleep Ever.....!!!
review: Dear Alexis H,  Thank you for your recent review of the hotel. I am so sorry to hear that you did not have a good experience with us at all, this is very disappointing. I was especially surprised to hear that you found the staff unwelcoming as we usually review very highly on the friendliness of the team so I apologise if you did not find this the case. I will certainly pass on all your comments to the housekeeping team and of course maintenance and ensure that these issues will be rectified. I really do hope that you will reconsider your decision to return to the hotel at a future date.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Returned to stay after a few years
review: On the 23rd July my boyfriend and I stayed one night at the Bracken Court hotel. I have one or two main areas of complaint. One being the fact that the room has no air conditioning which led to us having to open a window ( see photos) in the hopes that some air would begin to circulate in our overly warm room. It didn't. The windows did not open enough to allow any air to flow in or out. We were horribly uncomfortable in the awful heat most of the night. With the window open we could hear the noise of the street, the non-stop screeching of gulls on the roof and worst of all the boom from the large pipes which lay outside our window ( room 220) . We had little to no sleep. Also, during the night im guessing staff like to take advantage and move heavy duty goods up and down the…

title: Lovely little hotel!
review: Dear Laura S,  Many thanks for taking the time to post a review of the hotel. We appreciate all feedback that we receive. I was so sorry that your stay was so disappointing and you did not have a good nights sleep at all. I will take on your comments on board regarding the air conditioning and noise of the street and outside piping and see if we can make any changes that would enhance a future stay. I do hope that you found the rest of the hotel to your liking and I apologise once again for your bad experience.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: What a fantastic hotel!
review: stayed for 3 nights which included breakfast and a 3 course dinner with a bottle of wine. received a nice room which suited our needs although we found the beds uncomfortable to sleep in. dinner was average and breakfast was a bit hit and miss as it was a buffet style and the chef had to reheat the breakfast that we chose all 3 days we were there. 2 of the days the breakfast was still barely warm. this was disappointing.

title: Better sound-proofing badly needed
review: I stayed last night at the Bracken Court Hotel.  It was my second visit having been there previously when attending a wedding.  Last night I was pretty exhausted having traveled to the West and back over the weekend and needed a good night's sleep.  This was not to be had unfortunately at this hotel.  Firstly my room was facing the front street and, due to poor sound-proofing, the noise levels were ridiculous - I also suspect a number of patrons were gathered outside smoking as the voices and laughter were travelling up to my room.  I don't know if there was a function on in the hotel last night but I was woken numerous times during the night by guests shouting and laughing and banging doors in the corridor outside my room (I was on the second floor). All of this combined with…

title: Fantastic Hotel and Top Class Staff
review: Dear ClareMcDublin,  Thank you so much for your review of the hotel, all feedback is welcome which allows us to constantly monitor our standards and any issues that may arise. I am so sorry that your stay was so disappointing due to the noise levels. I shall pass on all your comments to senior management regarding the sound proofing and we will endeavor to improve on these issues. I am however delighted to hear that you found the staff so welcoming. I do hope that you will visit us again in the future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: 21st Birthday Party
review: We stayed here on Saturday night for our complimentary first year Anniversary overnight stay with dinner. We had a wonderful time and the food was fab........highly recommend the seafood chowder! But it's the staff who definitely make it a wonderful stay, from the lovely girl at check in to the great staff in the bar

title: a beautiful hotel very impressed
review: Dear Amanda O,  Many thanks for your recent review of the hotel, it is very much appreciated. I am delighted that you had such a great time on your anniversary and enjoyed your meal so much. I shall pass on your comments to the chef regarding the chowder, it is his own recipe and I am sure he will be pleased. You are absolutely right about the team here at the hotel, they are our biggest asset and I am happy that you found them so welcoming. Thanks again for your review and we will see you soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Absolutely lovely
review: We had an amazing 21st Birthday Party at The Bracken Court Hotel on Friday 17th July. The staff were amazing!!! Nothing was too much trouble. The food was fantastic and  The DJ rocked. !!! Absolutely reccomend the Hotel as a party venue.

title: It's beautiful hotel
review: Very nice hotel but no atmosphere though. The bar is cold and pints aren't that nice. The staff are very attentive and polite. We got great deal on booking.com but prob wouldn't stay again. No complaints just wasn't my cup of tea. Nothing really in the area to do.

title: Somewhat disappointing
review: Dear Nicola 16a 1987,  Thank you very much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel. I am glad that you found all the staff helpful and attentive but I am so sorry that the hotel was just not to your liking. There are quite a few local attractions around the area which we would have been delighted to give you all the relevant information on. I shall report the issue in the bar to our maintenance department and rectify this, thank you for letting us know and thanks again for your review.  Kind Regards,  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Wedding venue
review: The main drawback of this hotel is that it is in the wrong place - Balbriggan has very little going for it other than a plethora of fast food outlets - could not find a decent place to eat so we drove the 5 miles to Skerries each night where there are several very good restaurants.  Why did we not eat in the hotel? Three reasons. Firstly the noise and bussle in the restaurant (which is open through to the bar). Secondly the absence of natural light and the dark furniture makes it somewhat dreary and finally the menu did not excite us.  The hotel has good points. Good size bedrooms well equipped - ironing board, enough chairs, temperature right unlike many overly hot hotels. However not a 4 star.  I would stay again if the price was right now I know you need to travel a few miles…

title: My daughters wedding!
review: Dear Ken G,  Many thanks for your recent review on the hotel, we appreciate all feedback so that we can constantly strive to uphold and improve all aspects of the hotel and service. I am so sorry that you were somewhat disappointed with your stay but happy that you found the accommodation appealing and comfortable. There are alot pf plans afoot for Balbriggan to improve the general area and surroundings so I would hope that you might visit again and hopefully be impressed by the improvements. Thank you again for your review.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: midweek break
review: We just had our wedding there on july 11th,the hotel is 1st class,everything exceeded our expectations. The staff were all wonderful i cannot thank them all enough everyone was so friendly. Huge thanks to sinead,connor and georgie who looked after us on the day,nothing was a hassle for them. Everyone was raving about the food and the service,it was to die for. If you chose the bracken court for your wedding you wont be sorry. Thanks for a amazing day guys and girls. Mr&mrs foley

title: NOT close to the airport
review: I am guessing that the title of my review instantly makes people feel that this hotel is not worth staying at, this is not true. My gripe is that the hotel was advertised as being close to Dublin airport, but it was actually a 40 euro cab trip away!!  The hotel itself is quite nice and clean, but not what I would class as 4 star. Balbriggan is a quaint little place right on the coast just North of Dublin. There's quite a bit to see and do in the area and the people are nice and helpful.  The rooms are dated but large and clean. The restaurant opens for breakfast before anything else in town does and the prices are reasonable for  coastal town in Summer. I was very happy with my stay at the Bracken Court, I was just led astry by their advertising the fact that they were close to…

title: Lovely hotel in great location
review: Dear Sean M,  Thank you for taking the time to post a review of the hotel. All feedback is greatly received and it is only through these channels that we can strive to improve our service. I am sorry that you feel that you were wrongly informed, we would view ourselves as close by to the airport as we are just off the M1 motorway which is a direct route to the airport of approximately 20km and a 20 minute drive. I will pass on these comments to our sales and marketing team. Although I am glad that you found the hotel and the town to your liking. I do hope that you will visit us again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: surprise ..  stumbled on...!.  coffee and  desert  special  price  4.95
review: The hotel is in the centre on Balbriggan about 30km from Dublin. I drove from Dublin Port to the hotel in about half an hour. Large, clean room and bathroom. I didn't take an evening meal but the breakfast was excellent in comfortable surroundings. All staff were exceptionally helpful and cheerful. A ten minute walk takes you to the beach or the train station. The only thing I would say is that is not clear either from the website or arriving at the hotel how to access the car park. The entrance to the car park is right at the front of the hotel, but I initially mistook this for a public car park because of the barrier (which was, admittedly, up). Overall, I would not hesitate to stay again.

title: Not a 5 star accommodation
review: Dear MJG-Cardiff,  Thank you very much for the review of the hotel and I am delighted that you would stay with us again. As you will see form previous comments, our staff are an integral part of our success and I note form your comments that you found them all friendly and helpful, I will ensure that they are aware of these. I will pass your comments on breakfast to chef, I am glad that you found this excellent. I will pass your suggestions on the car park onto senior management and investigate whether we can improve our signage and direction, I am sorry if this caused any unnecessary confusion and I do look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Never again
review: popped  in  as a casual  .. friday  7 ish  looking  for  coffee and  cake.  they  were of course getting  ready  for dinner.!   lovely waitress,  Loisa, ( as in the  County ) !  offered  coffee  Ameircano and  choice of  cakes  but.. she  wasnt  sure  what  they  were ??  and i opted  for ( what i thought  was old fashioned)  bread and butter  pudding individual  portion , which  she  heated and served with cream.  umm   my  surprise and  delight it  was made  with  chocolate  Brioche.    i  suggested  that  the  hotel should have  sign  or  flags  describing the  daily deserts and  perhaps more people  would try  them.  great value  to have  a decent american  coffee and a desert/  cake  with  cream  for  4. 95.   they  should advertise  more.  outside the  premise.  many…

title: Wasn't great
review: We were given the wrong room which was  dusty , grubby , and tired looking.  The receptionist was lovely and changed our room for us.  The new room was nicer, however ,again, dusty, tired and very worn looking.    The evening meal was below average . I couldn't believe a side of vegetables was an extra charge.  The pork belly was tough and the fat wasn't crispy at all, just fatty and greasy.  The breakfast was VILE.  A carvery style breakfast where the chef puts your items on a plate then proceeds to stick the entire plate under a hot grill.  He puts the plate directly onto your tray do you don't have to touch the piping hot plate,  however when you get back to the table it's very dangerous trying to get the plate onto the table without burning your hands. (The grill also turns…

title: Perfect dinner
review: Dear Emma F,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a review of the hotel after your visit. I am only sorry that your stay was not an enjoyable one. I intend to check all of your observations and make the necessary changes but I would love the opportunity to discuss your stay in more detail with you. I am available on my email at any time, if you would like to email me directly and I can get some more details regarding the room and your stay. My email is: georgina@brackencourt.ie. I look forward to speaking with you.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Lovely Hotel and good value, but extremely long wait for food!
review: I was dining recently in Bracken Court Restaurant along with my girlfriend. The restaurant was very dark inside and we had a problem to read the menu because of that. Waitress who served us was very nice but every time we asked about the menu, she had to go and ask chef. More training would make no harm... Then it was just better and better...! My girfriend had fish cake and I had pig croquette to start, both were really, really tasty, very hot and presentation was exceptional!! For mains I had 10 oz sirloin steak med-rare and my soulmate had salmon. My steak was cooked to perfection! Excactly like I wanted:) Now the salmon: It was served with Lyonaise potatoes made with: new potatoes, sáute onions and bacon lardons. Wasn't sure if that will work with the fish but when I tried…

title: Midweek break
review: Dear JoeHagan,  Thank you so much for the review of our restaurant here at the hotel and I am delighted that it was such great experience for you and you will be returning. This is exactly how we want our guests to leave the hotel after a meal with us. I will speak with the restaurant manager regarding the training issues that you mentioned and will action this immediately. I will also pass on all these wonderful comments to the Head Chef to pass onto his team as I am sure that he will be delighted that you enjoyed his food and menu design so much. Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Great hotel
review: A party of 4 of us visited the Bracken Court last Saturday for a birthday meal and overnight stay.  The rooms are lovely, comfortable and spacious and the hotel itself is very nice.  The small problem we had was the length of time it took to serve our food, on Saturday afternoon we ordered sandwiches in the bar, they took 40 minutes to arrive we had to follow up on them twice.  We booked our dinner that night for 7.15pm, we ordered shortly after and were served our starters at 7.40pm and our main meal didn't arrive until 8.50pm... over an hour wait. In fairness the waitress was excellent and kept apologising, however we knew it was not her fault.  Nevertheless, the food was extremely tasty when it arrived just we felt it was such a shame that the wait completely overshadowed the…

title: Comfortable and friendly
review: The Hotel organised a golf trip for us and it was excellent value for money.The staff were great and the folk entertainment on Wednesday evening was excellent.Overall a pleasant experience and we would be more than happy to do another trip anytime

title: Birthday Ruined!!!!
review: Dear 44 Den,  Many thanks for taking  the tome to post a review for the hotel, we appreciate your time and comments. I am delighted to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and found the hotel and your package such good value. We have recently introduced the traditional night so it is great to see that you and your group enjoyed the experience. We hope to see you back here at the hotel very soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: A Friendly super hotel ideal for families!
review: Got my weeks holidays from work for my birthday. My partner booked a two night stay in the bracken for my birthday so that we could do things around dublin away from the busy city and go driving to look at scenery etc. On arrival at the bracken my partner went in to check in while I parked the car. When he went to reception he was not greeted with a welcome or hello. The women at reception (arissa I think) he was asked what was the name and given the card for the room and was told that the rooms are passed the mirror. She then moved onto the next customer without saying thank you or hope you enjoy your stay. When we got to the room it was very dark and dull and very warm and stuffy. Carpets were dirty and room looked very old (comparing to other 4 star hotels I have stayed in.)…

title: Nice service
review: Dear Sharon F,  Many thanks for your review of the hotel as all feedback is extremely valuable to us and it is only through this, we can steadily make improvements to the hotel and our service. I would love the opportunity to discuss the many issues you had during your stay which I was very sorry to hear. If you would like to do this, please do email me directly at georgina@brackencourt.ie  to discuss further. I do look forward to hearing from you soon.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Great Service
review: This was my first time staying here and it is a very elegant old world hotel.  What really impressed me was the friendliness of the staff who were without exception superb.  It is ideal for families.  I highly recommend it although God knows and it has nothing to do with the hotel it is a  pity the town would not clean the pier area up.  It is an ideal walk from the hotel to the pier and beach and the pier looks like a forgotten dump and it and the water there are filthy.  But the hotel is well worth staying in.  Dr. Michael Grimes

title: Short stay
review: Stayed here for one night only recently so not able to give full review but am able to say that hotel rooms are clean and staff are very friendly and helpful it is a very busy hotel and bar area can get very crowded we had meal in the hotel and food is very nice, only complaint I'd have is at breakfast the food is good and service from counter is good the problem was that there is no tea and coffe makers you have to order them but problem here is that breakfast was finished by the time coffe came it's the same for toast it has to be ordered I think it's about time quest were trusted with making there own tea coffe and toast as is the norm in most hotels , but don't let this little upset put you off it seems this hotel is very popular with locals so can't be all bad

title: Bracken court hotel.
review: Dear WilliamKellett,  Thank you very much for your review for the hotel and I am sorry that you were only with us for a short time, maybe next time you can stay with us for a longer period and enjoy everything that the hotel and Balbriggan has to offer. I am glad that you found our rooms so clean and that the staff you encountered were all friendly and helpful, they are certainly a credit to us here at the hotel and I will make sure that your comments are passed along to the team. I will also take your comments on breakfast and discuss them with the Food & Beverage team here and see how we can enhance the breakfast experience and make the necessary improvements so that you can enjoy a nice hot coffee with your breakfast. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you at the hotel in the near future.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: Lovely Hotel
review: Stayed here last Wednesday night , en route to the north of Ireland . Hotel old and carpets not very clean, but we had a nice dinner and our waitress just couldn't do enough for us. Not sure if I would go back there again!

title: Lovely hotel
review: Dear Ireland Corky,  Thank you for taking the time to post a review for the hotel and I do hope that the rest of your trip was successful. I was glad to hear that you enjoyed your meal so much and that our staff were very accommodating, I will be sure to pass on your comments to the team. However I do hope that you will visit us again as there is constant progress in the hotel with regards to updating and refurbishment and you may find it more comfortable next time you pass through on your travels. I do hope to see you again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: OK for Touring Around
review: I recently stayed here with my whole family for my niece's wedding. The hotel was lovely. It was clean and all the staff were extremely helpful. We had a family room which had 2 double rooms one was ensuite with walk-in shower and jacuzzi. We had a sitting room with a fireplace, couches and coffee table and we even had a kitchen with a microwave and a full size fridge and tea and coffee facilities. Would definately stay again.

title: Wedding
review: Myself and the wife got married here on the 31st of  October  last year and I have to say it was the best day of ours lives food was amazing  the two rooms we done up beautiful  the staff were outstanding  we could  fault anything  what's so ever .Jean  the manager looking  after us was the best so friendly and  welcoming  and always had a smile  on  her face and happy to answer  any questions be has no matter  how small or silly  we thought it was  she was always  happy to answer  them for u a so if your looking  for  a place for your wedding  or any party  I'd highly recommend this  stunning  hotel.if your there  see if you can go onto the rooftop terrace  for the amazing  views of balbriggan the harbour  and  ocean  it's stunning thanks for a great wedding  all of the staff.

title: Myth and Reality Collided
review: Dear Poopir,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review and I am delighted to hear that your wedding day was such a huge success and fills you with so many happy memories. As you know, weddings are an integral part of our business and it is delightful to see that you could not fault anything. Our staff are one of our strongest accolades here at the hotel and I will be sure to pass on your comments to the team and specifically Jean. We look forward to seeing you for your first anniversary, if not before so thank you once again.  Kind Regards  Georgina Konings  Operations Manager

title: The WOW factor in abundance!
review: We were travelling to Dublin to attend a birthday party and decided to break the journey as our hotel booking in Dublin was for the following day. This hotel was picked, partly from its appearance in the photographs but mainly because of its good reviews on the TA site, it certaily looked the part. In making the booking online my session timed out, redoing it I didn't enter the day of arrival correctly as I was keen to make sure I wasn't timed out again. A lady staff member called me at home and asked if I was arriving that evening, and matters were corrected, my estimation of the hotel rose significantly. Now the fun began, it was a devil to find, picking out a structure as imposing as displayed in the pictures, it just didn't happen, narrow street with lots of traffic and no…

title: Rooms comfortable, location in middle of Balbriggan
review: Dear George L,  Thank you for taking the time to post a review for the hotel and I appreciate your comments on honesty and just saying it like it is, there is nothing malicious in your comments and all feedback is greatly appreciated.
